one_reviews_text: La sensazione che si prova è a dir poco incredibile e veramente molto realistica.Si apre una nuova dimensione dell'utilizzo del PC. Una volta provato non si riesce piùa farne a meno. Un utilizzo del visore al massimo delle prestazioni richiede un PC adeguatoe performante.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 12 December 2019
review_title: Oculus Rift S PC-Powered VR Casco di realtà virtuale

one_reviews_text: The headset was fine for a while, then I started having a lot of bugs. My headset had an issue where it would just restart itself out of the blue and I would have to restart my games every time. I was in contact with support for 2 months, I've had people close my tickets even though the issue was not fixed, and some just stopped replying. Worst customer service I've ever dealt with. Worse than my isp in my opinion. And after all this, they refused to replace my headset with a new one under warranty.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 20 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Sensors cant track headset, No Display port Connection This Headset has been nothing but a headache it worked for about a week haven't used it for about 6 months and now I just keep getting error "Sensors cant track headset" I've tried everything spent several hours researching trial and error and oculus website support is useless don't waste your time and money on this headset.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 2 November 2020

one_reviews_text: a pesar de ser aficionado al mundo vr, estas gafas tienen una serie de defectos imperdonables: 1. el fov es una vergüenza, parece que vas a bucear, un paso atrás con respecto a las cv1, 2. problemas con el usb del ordenador de manera que las tienes que reconectar cada vez y lo peor 3. los exclusivos de oculus todos en ingles y ni subtítulos en español, de manera que cuando traten con respeto a los usuarios de habla hispana quizá me plantee su compra
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 9 February 2020
review_title: devuelto por falta de soporte por parte de oculus

one_reviews_text: Ancora oggi, guardando l'offerta penso che sia ancora il prodotto migliore.Se ti vuoi prendere un Quest, bene, ma sara piu pesante.Arriva HP Reverb G2, beh, avra una risoluzione della madonna ma lo stesso FOV di 110 gradi. Visto che e 4K, quando arriva un prodotto 4K con un FOV da 130 gradi sara peggio perche sei abituato con la densita di 4K @ 110 gradi, non so se vale la pena.Poi ce Vive Index, che ha la stessa densita di pixel con un FOV da 130 gradi. Questo e un prodotto legitimo e migliore, ma con un prezzo piu che doppio, se hai le tasche profonde vai con quello. Ma Vive Index non ha inside-out tracking  che secondo me offre una comodita enorme, non devi mettere cavi USB  in tutta la stanza.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 26 October 2019

one_reviews_text: VOR FESTSTELLUNG VON Intel USB 3.0 slots, neues thema anscheinend dass, intel und asus in ihrer usb programmierung wesentlich unterscheiden und Oculus scheint sich im wesentlichen an der Intel variante zu orientieren.. mir wurde gesagt ich würde niemals das system verwenden können da keine intel slots vorhanden waren bzw. nur USB 2.0 aaaalso genau hin schauen und das eigene system evtl. untersuchen in dem kontext.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 20 March 2020

one_reviews_text: Il pacco è arrivato puntuale ed in perfette condizioni.Prodotto eccellente per caratteristiche tecniche e confort (nonostante sia presente il cavo).Ottima definizione delle lenti e buone sensazioni tattili dei due controller Oculus Touch.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 20 August 2021

one_reviews_text: For those of us that don't want Facebook to peek into our lives, choose another headset. I'll be replacing this soon due to privacy concerns I have with facebook. The headset will need to be linked to a facebook account in time. I use facebook products where I have to, but I can buy another headset.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 23 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Do 4 stelle solo perché a me provoca giramenti di testa dopo 10 min. Ma a qualcuno può capitare e purtroppo è più un problema soggettivo. L'esperienza cmq è pazzesca
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 26 September 2019

one_reviews_text: a distanza di mesi trovo il prodotto fantastico,  ti proietta in un altro mondo e il costo è giusto ,lo ricomprerei assolutamente.Per chi fosse indeciso sull'acquisto, lo consiglio vivamente, bisogna tenere a mente perché il PC deve essere "VR READY" così da avere già tutte le porte necessarie ed essere sicuri di non aver problemi.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 30 May 2020
review_title: esperienza fantastica, soprattutto coi nuovi giochi

one_reviews_text: Für diesen Preis ist diese VR-Headset sehr gut. Sehr leicht zum installieren. Trotz 80hz füllt sich das Erlebnis flüssig an. Eine sehr tolle Einsteiger Brille. Tracking ist sehr präzise. Die Audio Qualität ist nicht die beste aber man kann ein paar Köpfhörer anschließen. Leider gehen Headsets nicht immer. Diese müssen relativ groß sein damit man sie aufsetzen kann. Ich bin trotzdem sehr zufrieden. Kann sie nur weiter Empfehlen.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 22 March 2020

one_reviews_text: Rift s è un bel gioiellino. Era un bel po’ che volevo un bel visore per pc e ho scelto questo. La comodità di avere il traking integrato è una cosa stupenda lo colleghi al pc con DisplayPort e usb 3.0 e tutto è pronto, non servono telecamere o altre preferiche esterne perché è tutto nel visore. La resa del pannello a parer mio è ottima. Io gioco con un i7 7700k 32 gb di ram e gtx 1070 e non ho avuto problemi con nessun titolo, anche half life alix gira che è una meraviglia 😍 consiglio l’acquisto a tutti coloro che hanno un pc vr ready ovviamente... buona giocata!!!!!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 1 January 2021

one_reviews_text: I've had the rift s for 7 months now. Over this time it's been constant issues. You won't stop spending money on this headset to make it good.The audio is terrible.the headset is uncomfortable for extended use (which is a must when playing for anywhere over 1 hr).The microphone is terrible and will constantly have issues, my first issue with the microphone was it would stop picking up sound, now my issue is every time I play it will amplify and make it sound like I'm blowing at the microphone.The screen will randomly stop and go black or it will freeze. The headset will randomly stop tracking itself and you'll just have a still screen (this is a big one and can take ages to fix).100% do your research before buying this headset, I strongly suggest buying anything but oculus as they are owned by Facebook and will collect your data.Everyday I with I'd purchased a better headset.look at better headsets like the hp reverb 2 and the valve index.Hopefully you consider the warnings here.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 21 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Die Verarbeitung der Rift S ist kurz gesagt gut. Es wackelt nichts und Halo + Gesichtsteil wirken stabil.Eine Sorge bereitet mir die Haltbarkeit des Schaumstoffes am Gesichtpolster. Der wirkt recht dünn und wenig strapazierfähig, sodass unachtsame Griffe schnell zu Schäden führen könnten. Ich befürchte, dass man diesen in einem Intervall von 1-2 Jahren austauschen muss.Das Kabel stört ein wenig, da es entweder im Weg baumelt oder über dem Rücken recht stark an der Brille zieht.BildDer Taucherbrilleneffekt ist Dank des recht großen Blickwinkel gut erträglich und fällt kaum auf.Leider bietet die Rift S keine IPD Einstellung der Linsen, sodass ich mit eine Pupillenabstand von ca 70 mm bereits Probleme habe die Brille so auszurichten um scharf sehen zu können.Ungeachtet dessen ist die Bildqualität im Vergleich zu einem 2D Monitor schlecht. Die Auflösung sollte dringend verbessert werden, um sowohl den Fliegengitter-Effekt zu verringern als auch eine detaillierte Darstellung in der Ferne zu ermöglichen.Sowohl die Oculus Tutorials als auch VR Spiele zeigen deutlich die Schwächen des Displays auf.Die eingebauten Kameras sind, man kann es nicht anders beschreiben mies. Ich kann die Qualität noch nicht mal beschreiben, denn nicht mal uralt Webcams haben so eine schlechte Qualität. Für das Tracking reicht es aber.Euro Truck Simulator 2 (Alles auf Maximum)Der Fliegengittereffekt zieht sich durch die gesamte Anwendung. Die Instrumententafel ist noch gut lesbar, jedoch hört die Lesbarkeit von Schilder schnell auf sodass selbst bei 200% Texturskalierung in der Ferne nur Pixel und Fliegengitter zu sehen sind.Doom VRDie Grafik wirkt pixelig, obwohl sie in der 2D Version sehr detailliert ist. Die Bewegung ist mit Teleportation umständlich.Seeking DawnDie Dunkelheit im 1. Level macht dem Display sehr zu schaffen und sorgt dafür das die Viecher nur schwer erkennbar sind.Skyrim Elder Scrolls VDas Spiel sieht im VR noch am Besten aus. Die geringeren Auflösungen stören wenig und werden durch bunte Farben und Effekte übertüncht. Schwert und Bogen machen im VR einfach Spaß.Tutorial und VR UmgebungGut gelungen und die Umgebung ist so angepasst, dass die Bildschwächen nicht ganz so auffallen.TonIst zu leise und taugt nicht viel. Es ist aber noch bequem möglich ein großen Over Ear Headset drüber zu stülpen.TrackingDas Tracking ist sehr gut und Verzögerungen bemerkt man auch nicht.Für Bewegungen auf offenen Gelände gibt es leider noch kein gutes VR Konzept. Spiele die Armbewegungen verlangen, finde ich am besten gelungen. Die Laufsimulation wirkt der VR Krankheit entgegen.Viele Spiele setzen auf Teleportation, was teilweise verwirrt und den Spielfluss zerstört. Spiele wie Skyrim bieten Laufen über die Daumensticks an. Diese Art der Fortbewegung ist gut bedienbar, aber endet schnell in Übelkeit und Unwohlsein. Das Innenohr läuft leider nicht mit.Am besten geeignet ist die Brille, wenn sie stationär oder im abgegrenzten Spielbereich verwendet wird. Weitläufige Spiele sind noch nicht soweit.3D BlurayHabe ich nicht ausprobiert. Doch durch die Tatsache, dass Spiele mit sonst guter Grafik so schlecht abschneiden sorgt bei mir schon für Vorurteile gegenüber der Qualität von Blurays.ZusammenfassungInteressante Erfahrung, aber höchstens für Minispiele geeignet und für den Preis von knapp 500 Euro erwarte ich schon eine ausgereifte Technologie und Software.Sollte irgendwann eine bezahlbare VR Brille mit akzeptabler Auflösung herauskommen, kann man sich wieder überlegen eine zu kaufen. Solange sollte man das Geld lieber in einen guten Monitor investieren.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 9 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Great display and easy to set up/store. There's a few VR gems out at the moment like Alyx and Lone Echo, and they really shine with the increased resolution of the rift s. It's not too heavy on the face, fairly comfortable and easy to adjust (but pupil distance isn't manually changeable, which is a bit funky.)Only problem for me is that it suffers a bit in performance in online games like Phasmophobia (however it is an unstable beta so 🤷‍♀️.)
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 3 March 2021

one_reviews_text: Built in audio is too quiet. I use headphones over top of VR headset. Kinda cumbersome.There is a jack that you could plug in earbuds. These are my first VR headset. Entry level price for entry level product. Which isn't bad. They do the job. I play mostly DCS world flight sims. These are second gen technology so a lot ofimprovements have been made.For what they cost I would sat they are worth it.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 28 October 2019

one_reviews_text: Es otra dimensión en juegos y experiencias vr, pero todavía necesitan mucha máquina y que se deje de ignorar al mercado español, tanto en la venta directa como en la traducción de juegos, sigue siendo un artículo de minorías por la inversión que requiere y las dudas de los propios desarrolladores...
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 8 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Was a nice lite system my Autistic son loved playing it .But do to the fact the cord plugs in moving around playing it has put a cliich in the cord and it cuts in an out .You can not order a replacement cord from them .Would not reccomend buying from this place.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 February 2021

one_reviews_text: The facial interface is uncomfortable and quickly soaks with sweat, the lenses are prone to fogging, unless you have nice wireless earbuds or smaller headphones it's difficult to get good audio quality and comfort, and the oculus software is an irritating middleware you're forced to use in addition to anything else.Overall a very underwhelming consumer experience that would take additional investment to truly enjoy. I would not recommend this unless you're really dedicated to throwing money away, they clearly were not concerned with the overall quality of experience.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 15 September 2020
review_title: Comfort is unnaceptable, user experience is frustrating.

one_reviews_text: The packaging for the rift s was really well done there was a scrath or two on the device but barely noticeable. I ran into a major problem at first when i plugged in the device i was hounded by the same message that the cables werent such as the usb port wasn't in Figuring tried changing to another port and was still hit with the same message ( this is also a new pc )After about an hour i finally got it to work and my god videos dont do vr justice at all. Best way for me to describe it is if you've ever gone diving or underwater i'd say about the same experience truly like entering another world.I dont tend to have much free time so i only had 3 chances to play the rift 1st time the usb thing happened 2nd was fine 3rd time however the same problem consisted dont know if its a common thing or im lucking out badly.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 15 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Very easy to set up and the tracking is fabulous considering there's no external trackers.It jitters occasionally( not badly though) and the controllers don't work great behind you. But the next best option is almost double the money, so it's definitely worth the trade.And the comments about failing USB 3.0 are because it's picky, an update and a computer restart and mine worked fine.Being my first VR experience , All in all I'm very satisfied with this product at this price point.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 6 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Does not have an IPD( interpupillary distance) which is the distance between the center of your eyes  and unfortunately if you dont fit into the rift-s dimensions one of your eyes will be blurry all the time, i have lost some clarity in my left eye from using it a little bit and i stopped using it immediately when i noticed, fortunately i had a room mate who could use it just fine so i gave it to him but if you do not you should get a refund. as for me i had to buy another vr headset (rift quest-2) and pc cable so i could connect it.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 6 March 2021
review_title: Does not have a IPD( interpupillary distance)

one_reviews_text: The headset was kind of tricky to setup, and finally managed to get it working (most of the time, some times it having me unplug and replug the headset from my pc), but then in about less than a month I began having issues with the Left controller, it began displaying Phantom Input (when the controller acts on its own) making playing anything extremely difficult or impossible, and just for the record, I have not inflicted any damage whatsoever to the controller. This is either a manufacture error or standard quality, I pray its not standard quality of the item and if so, wish to receive a suitable replacement.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 26 March 2021
review_title: Great fun, but not for long...

one_reviews_text: Grafica migliorata... sensori sul casco ottimo e tracciano il movimento alla perfezione....spedizione rapidissima ...consiglio laquisto
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 16 June 2019

one_reviews_text: Ho acquistato questo prodotto convinto di poterlo utilizzare per il mio portatile ASUS ROG STRIX G e invece l'ho dovuto restituire.Il mio PC non ha la porta DisplayPort (ha una porta hdmi) e non c'è stato verso di trovare un adattatore displayport (femmina) e hdmi (maschio).Saluti...
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 7 December 2020

one_reviews_text: Tres satisfait de mon achat je suis un inconditionnel de la Réalité Virtuel et je peux vous dire que ce Masque (ou Casque) virtuel est au top,a condition d'avoir un Ordinateur Puissant car contrairement a la PSVR (que je possède) il est possible d'augmenter la performance et résolution si votre pc possède une bonne carte graphique (RTX 2060 pour moi),un bon proc et de la ram. Coté design rien a redire on appréciera la molette de serrage (type psvr) que je n'avais pas sur l'occulus quest.Les oculus touch sont bien adapté et le store oculus couplé au steam vr ne fais que renforcé d'avoir fait le bon choix.Le prix est plus que raisonable sur on le compare a la concurrence.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 29 November 2019

one_reviews_text: It is like being in the galley of a sailboat at sea. Trying to cook or navigate using maps.Taking it slowly, a little each day I am adapting to the environment.I think being tethered to a PC is not so good.If I had known what I do now, I would have waited and purchased the Oculus Quest 2 when it comes out.I think it really challenges the mind to adapt to a virtual world.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 18 September 2020
review_title: Entering virtual reality is not as easy  as I thought it would be.

one_reviews_text: I take nothing away from this headset, despite the two weeks of suffering, hours wasted with drivers and cables, and add-on cards, and calls to Oculus support to get it running. It was worth every minute of pain. The visual quality is fantastic. The tracking is amazing in any reasonably lit space. No complaints once I got it running.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 20 December 2019
review_title: Fantastic and amazing, despite all the pain to set it up.

one_reviews_text: Hormis le délai de livraison, j'adore les jeux en VR, et l'oculus rift est vraiment top.Chose importante. le cable fourni a une connectique DP et un adaptateur micro DP. Donc si votre ordi portable a uniquement du HDMI, vous serez embete. A patir de la, un adaptateur DP - HDMI ne fonctionne guere. Il faut un adaptateur DP - USB C. Il faut que votre port usb - c soit compatible DP. Ce genre d info est dispo sur la fiche descriptive de votre tour/ pc portable sur internet. J utilise un pc portable asus rog zephyrusg14, et avec l'adaptateur dp - usb c je suis capable de jouer :) bon nombre de jeux sont dispso sur l oculus store. j'ai seulement test quelques jeux ( beat saber, defector, job simulator) et c'est vraiment fun
review_date: Reviewed in France on 29 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Me encanto las primeras experiencias, las descripciones de como se ve y se siente no le hacen justicia, es muy bueno.Las nauseas son un problema, casi vomito la segunga vez que lo use y desde entonces no lo he usado, tienes que invertir un poco de tiempo para acostumbrate al VR. Solo tengan en consideracion que si son sensibles a marearse puede que no sea lo suyo.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 10 January 2021
review_title: muy buen producto, aunque no para todos

one_reviews_text: cuando compre el producto a los 2 meses empezo a darme problemas para conectar y ahora ya no funciona nada intento contactar con oculus para que me de una sulicion al problema y todo es en ingles y no me dan una solucion no se que hacer ni con quien tengo que contactar ya que tiene una garantia mas aparte compre un seguro me gustaria que alguien me ayudara con este problema ya que estamos hablando de un producto que no es precisamente barato
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 27 October 2021
review_title: esta averiado y no puedo contactar con el vendedor

one_reviews_text: Great product as advertised but found myself finding less and less motivation to play Vr games, as well as titles I wished to play being to expensive.The weigh of the head unit as well as fast titles like racing games can leave you feeling sore in the neck or quite sick unless you play often and build up tolerance. Would recommend for young children, families and teenage games to get the most benefit out of this kind of system.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 7 June 2021

one_reviews_text: The headset itself is good, I didn't have any technical problems. My problem is with VR in general. There are a few good games but for me it was not worth it. I would advise caution of being sucked into the hype. Half-Life: Alyx was a pretty good game but not worth getting vr for unless you are fine with deleting some money.  All of the games feel like Arcade games, they are fun at first but after a few hours or minutes for some it gets boring. I wouldn't recommend getting VR at this time.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 21 August 2020
review_title: VR is not worth it at this time

one_reviews_text: Muy contento con las S. Las utilizo sobre todo para simracing (Assetto Corsa, Iracing, etc).  Vengo de unas CV1. Más definición, mejores colores, luminosidad y no veo el efecto rejilla  El tema de los negros no lo noto.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 18 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Come al solito Rift ha soddisfatto le mie aspettative, senza scendere in particolari tecnici posso dire che la grafica è stata migliorata, i sensori sul caschetto donano più libertà durante le sessioni di gioco le telecamere frontali permettono di vedere l'ambiente circostante senza togliere il caschetto e la presenza di un solo filo da collegare al PC rende i movimenti più liberi: in poche parole lo consiglio senza riserve
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 20 July 2019
review_title: Caschetto da acquistare senza alcuna esitazione

one_reviews_text: Price-performance is really well. However it doesn't have physical IPD adjustment like before and its competitors. So it may cause that you cannot use the device properly.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 9 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Die Rift S ist an sich ein Fortschritt zur Vorgängerversion Rift. Diese hier kommt ohne die beiden Sensoren aus. Das spart nerviges aufstellen der Sensoren und ihr habt 2 USB-Plätze mehr zur Verfügung.Allerding geht das Kabel schnell kaputt (nach 2 Monaten Gebrauch). Ein paar mal um die eigene Achse beim Shooter gedreht und die Isolierung des Kabels löst sich, da sich das Kabel in sich verdreht.Der PC erkennt nicht mehr das Display-Kabel. Benutzung nicht mehr möglich.Oculus selbst erklärt dazu, daß es kein Garantiefall darstellt und weist mich daraufhin, daß ich für 89.- Euro über den Oculus Shop mir neue Kabel kaufen könne, wenn mir der Sinn danach steht.Steht er nicht. Ich wechsle zur Vive. Danke und Ciao :-)
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 21 January 2020
review_title: Kabel labil und geht nach 2 Monaten Gebrauch defekt.

one_reviews_text: Son mi primera experiencia con el VR y me parece bastante bueno, soy usuario de lentes y si me permite dejármelos puestos mientras estoy usando el visor. Se suda bastante con el uso y después de un rato puede pesar un poco.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 5 July 2021

one_reviews_text: From the start, things went terribly. I had windows 7, I start the installation process. I get a message saying I need 2 updates from Microsoft, I do them. I try again, it tells me the same thing, so I look around and apparently it's a common issue, ok, weird. I need to run the setup with cmd and a special command to bypass the screen. So that works, I move on. Now it forces me to install on C: which I keep only for windows. Google again, to be able to install on another drive, I need to run the install using cmd and a special command. Really? Ya'll can't afford to put a text box on your setup to write a path? So I do what it says, I run it with my two special commands to skip the update page and install on different drive. At this point I'm already feeling weird but I decide to ignore it. The download starts, approx. 7GB. Eventually the download suddenly freezes 2MBs from the end. Now I'm losing patience. Nothing I can do, so I close the setup and try again. Only now because I closed it there's some background process messing up the setup so I end up rebooting. Try the download again, this time it ends fine. I move on to the installation process which takes forever. But that works fine too, then I get to a screen telling me to plug 2 USBs and a displayport. But I only have 1 usb cable attached to the headgear. Anyway I plug it in, then the oculus software starts trippin and opens a bunch of windows in a constant loop, each time ending in errors. I close them all and try it again multiple times, reinstall, everything, nothing works. So I'm thinking it must be windows 7 issues. I end up upgrading to win 10. Now everything should work, right? Start the whole process again. This time the setup downloads the files at 0 mbps (but I see the bar moving so whatever). Once that's all done, I see a screen I hadn't seen before. I get to choose which rift I have, so I choose RIFT S and now it shows me the right amount of USB ports. So I plug the USB, works fine, then I plug in the displayport. Displayport gets recognized for 1 second then turns red and won't work. Many hours of trying various things later, no luck. I try to opt in for the beta thing since apparently it can fix the displayport issue. I download the updates, run the firmware update on the headgear. Try again but now the usb isn't working anymore. I try reinstalling everything, rebooting, nothing works. So I'm returning it, I've never seen such a bad software in my life, and I'm a programmer. Truly shameful product, I'll be saving my money and getting a vive later on instead.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 7 December 2019
review_title: The worst piece of equipment I've ever purchased

one_reviews_text: save your money . i bought this when it first came out and i payed $615. since then ive had 3 of them because they have had to replace them due to faulty hardware. i am once again waiting for a response from the support team as i am having MORE problems with it. software crashes almost every time i use it and support will just tell you to do a few basic troubleshoots and ask for your logs for over a month then MAYBE they will send you a new headset. after the time to get ur money back is up though. oculus is a scam, buy a vive or index you will not regret it. if i could give 0 stars i would.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 6 March 2021
review_title: Absolute horrible headset, even worse support and even WORSE software

one_reviews_text: I bought the Rift S and got one day of use out of it before it decided to become a paperweight.  Had to work through two weeks of troubleshooting before getting an RMA through Oculus Support.  I get that VR is relatively new and PC issues are to be expected.  However, after reading about Rift S issues on the official Oculus forums, I fear I picked a losing horse in the race.  I saw similar issues to mine (USB connection, software restarts, sensor tracking) and a lack of software support for Rift/Rift S headsets to add features and address these issues.I'm disappointed in myself for not doing enough research, but also disappointed that the Rift, a product I was following since its Kickstarter days, has ended up like this.  At least their Support was prompt, professional, and eventually helped me get the Rift S replaced.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 2 August 2020

one_reviews_text: It did not come with the an adapter to hook this up to a standard HP laptop computer, A very unusual adapter was required. Not able to find it at any electronic / computer store in a major city. Had to special order it ($58) then when it arrived it would not recognize one of the connections on the laptop so this entire purchase was unusable. Had to send it back and get a refund.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 24 January 2021
review_title: That all the items & accessories (cables and adapters) are included for a main stream set up

one_reviews_text: mas cómodos, tienen mejor respuesta, se ve mejor, estos se empañan mucho menos y sobre todo al no tener los sensores es menos puertos usados, ya que hay laps como las omens que no mandan suficiente energía a los lentes, pero con este sin problemas, definitivamente si son mejores.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 11 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Just like the title says. I have 2 USB 3.0 slots and I have to struggle for 30-60 minutes to get it working EACH TIME.You might need to buy an expansion slot for USB 3.1 to make it work...This BUG HAS BEEN KNOWN SINCE PRODUCTION, which is over 6 months since release. NOTHING HELPS.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 17 December 2019
review_title: What they don't tell you is that you might need to buy an expansion slot for your motherboard!!!

one_reviews_text: Achat très décevantProduit non compatible avec les ports usb 3.0 de ma CM hors rien n'indique les compatibilités du produits...Après avoir décelé que le problème venait de là, j'ai du commander une carte pci-e USB  3.0Une fois cela installer le casque fonctionneMais je ne trouve absolument pas ce produit qualitatif, les manettes mal détectées par le casque, un réglage plus que sommaire au niveau du visage, très difficile de réussir à bien l'ajuster.Ajustement de la distance des lentilles ce faisant via logiciel, impossible de les écarter réellement ce qui est un gros point noir...Produit retourné à l'envoyeur...
review_date: Reviewed in France on 20 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Excellent produit, tracking impressionnant, compatible avec tout les store vr, cependant l'audio intégré est plutôt très moyen (pour plus d'immersion prenez de bons écouteurs ou un casque qui passera par dessus les arceaux de fixation) le micro intégré est suffisant mais un bug logiciel le rend inutilisable avec les processeur AMD (ryzen principalement, effet de voix métallique) pas de fox à ce jour, mis à part cela je le recommande vivement vu son prix  et la qualité des futurs jeux oculus
review_date: Reviewed in France on 28 December 2019
review_title: Excellent casque, prévoir micro casque externe

one_reviews_text: I've had this for two weeks now, the first week was pretty good, though I didn't use it that much. Once I cleared out an area to play in I started having problems. In the middle of games it would suddenly stop tracking. When starting up it would show white static instead of the surrounding area. Now after two weeks putting on the headset all I get is black. There was a firmware update last week which may have been the issue otherwise it's getting returned for a refund.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 1 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Venia de las CV1 y me ha sorprendido gratamente lo que se lleva a notar de mejoría.Merece la pena perder ese plus que tiene las CV1 en negros por evitar el glare y la mayor resolución.Le falta un poco más de FOV, pero para simracing no importa tanto.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 4 March 2020

one_reviews_text: Could not get the device to connect to my PC. The sensors could not be detected despite trying many fixes on the internet and with support. So I had to return the item. Waiting for the Quest 2 to buy at a lower price and perhaps better connectivity.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 25 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Es la primera vez que pruebo la realidad virtual y simplemente dire que es impresionante, impresionante!!!Las Oculus son comodas y no me han mareado para nada, cosa que todos decian que me pasaria (aunque supongo que esto es algo personal).
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 9 May 2020

one_reviews_text: The machine works excellent. But they should make it much clearer to the purchaser how strongly it can effect motion sickness. What you see does not match what your body feels. Like reading in a moving vehicle. Your body is moving but your eyes don’t register it... So the mismatch makes you feel queasy - flip the input and see a lot of motion-  but feel none ....  And yer outside sweating - leaning against the wall - Calling your “friend” Charlie.  They say it improves over time - the more you use it... Boy ! You really gotta wanna use it! Mine is for sale.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 6 January 2021
review_title: Works wonderfully -But should come with a warning!

one_reviews_text: Excelente calidad, llegó antes de lo provista a penas de atorarse un día en aduanas, tenía fecha aproximada 16 de enero y llegó en 9 se enero con sus protecciones y todo bien.Cumple lo que promete, rápido y fácil de configurar para comenzar a jugar. Tiene muchísimos juegos y experiencias gratis, aunque es verdad que los mismos juegos de paga estan hasta en 50% en Steam VR.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 12 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Semplicemente fantastico se paragonato con il primo rift. La risoluzione, anche se non molto superiore sembra doppia rispetto a prima e l'effetto zanzariera è quasi invisible. Bel lavoro Oculus
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 7 July 2019

one_reviews_text: My Rift S is the first VR experience I've ever had and its truly astonishing, you are completely immersed into a whole other world.Make sure to complete all Graphics Card updates, windows updates, and basically anything you can to be on the latest version of all your drivers.Its so easy to setup and use that a child could do it, plug in a USB 3 to your Motherboard, a DisplayPort into your graphics card and you are up and running, from there just follow the instructions on screen to initialize your headset and sync your controllers, then setup your play area with the headset on and you're ready to go.From in box to setup and playing in about 5 minutes.Like anything now after a couple weeks its starting to get less use, as there is only so much content available, and although I love Beat saber, walking dead and Pavlov VR, those experiences can be taxing and not necessarily what you want to do after a long days work, but the amount of fun to be had and the joy of seeing a friend try out VR for the first time makes it worth it for me.If you are in the market for a VR experience and you have the computer to back it up then I believe the Oculus Rift S is the best bang for the buck VR experience on the market right now.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 March 2020
review_title: The Oculus Rift S is the quintessential VR experience.

one_reviews_text: Ho provato parecchi visori, ma questo è il migliore come prima esperienza. Visione chiara anche nella lettura, facile da installare, comodo, direi che è un ottimo prodotto
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 19 June 2019

one_reviews_text: Este visor tiene demasiados problemas con los USB y el DisplayPort para su detección.Adicionalmente he podido comprobar que el FOV es escaso, ausencia de negros, baja calidad de la diadema y de los plásticos en generar, audio insuficiente en volumen e inexistente en calidad, visión periférica al punto dulce borrosa, pantallazos negros inexplicables. Todo esto en solo dos días de prueba, lo cual pone de manifiesto que este visor aun esta una fase temprana de desarrollo y no está para su versión release.No soy nuevo en VR, ni es el primer visor que tengo, por lo que hablo con criterio tanto por experiencia como por conocimientos técnicos.Aunque Oculus haya puesto poco mimo con este visor, continuaré confiando en ellos, eso sí, siempre y cuando vuelva a ver la calidad en sus productos al menos como lo hizo con las CV1.Si nunca antes has probado la VR, este visor es para ti, pero si vienes de otros tales como CV1, HTC o Samsung ni te molestes.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 1 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Without trying one before buying, but reading on the internet (and having some experience with the Rift CV1 and HTC Vive) I decided to buy the product during Black Friday 2019. It's not June 2020 and it's still working amazing. Totally worth buying, I have barely encountered any problems with it (and they've been easily fixable).Amazon and UPS delivered my package in exactly 48 hours during Black Friday (to Romania, which still blows my mind even nowdays and I cannot recommend enough grabbing it from here if you can).Thanks a ton.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 2 June 2020
review_title: Great product, works like a charm

one_reviews_text: Honestly i picked this after living with the terrible PSVR for to long so i can only really compare this to that unfortunately but in saying that i believe this is one million times better in every way possible the graphics are great the sound for me seems fine and the games are fun also having access to steams vr library is a very big added benefit.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 4 December 2019
review_title: So real you'll forget your in there

one_reviews_text: Son mis primeros VR y la verdad son impresionantes! Fácil de instalar, y muy intuitivo, lo unico malo es es que son adictivos, los recomiendo ampliamente. No te arrepentirás. Ojo, es necesario tener entrada DisplayPort y al menos una de usb libre.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 25 December 2020

one_reviews_text: Sin duda es increible como ha avanzado esta tecnologia, puedes comprar juegos en steam compatibles con VR y jugar sin problemas, lo juego en una laptop pero tiene salida DisplayPort, si no tiene esta salida no funciona con adaptadores HDMI, solo con adaptadores USB-C, en general no he tenido ni un solo problema y es entretenido jugar con ellos.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 4 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Headset worked for a few minutes when I set it up, lost tracking and never worked again. Now I always get "Sensors can't track headset" error. Support doesn't offer any real solutions. Hopefully they'll fix it later, but for now I'll keep using my Vive.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 25 May 2019

one_reviews_text: I'm glad i Bought it as the inside out Tracking is Awsome as  I have full 360 Movement without  losing  Tracking  and can even have my app store and Desktop in My Home to see in the  pass thru camera  like Microsoft Hololens AR  . Which is Awsome Expeirance that No other Vr can do that's on the Market Now. Glad I purchased this as I can take it to a freinds House without worry about setting up Base stations or outside Tracking sensors easy to set up . I Recommend this Vr Head set for the Mobility . CLARITY  .No God Rays .No Screen Door Effect and Comfort and pass Thru camera that gives you extra Entertainment watching YouTube on a Big Screen or Browsing the Web while seeing your living Room Great Experience if you can't aford Microsoft Holo Lens
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 1 August 2019
review_title: Has a AR feature like  Microsoft Holo  Lens

one_reviews_text: Très bon casque à un bon rapport qualité-prix par contre la casque ne marchait plus après seulement 2 semaine d'utilisation j'ai contacté l'Assistance on me l'a finalement échangé contre un reconditionné. Pour parler du casque en lui-même il est pas mal j'ai été conquis par le traking des contrôleurs qui est très bon l'affichage n'est pas le meilleur mais est correct pour le prix le gros défaut que je lui trouve c'est le chand de vision qui est très faible, vous avez l'impression de regardé dans des jumelles. Aussi pour parler du logiciel l'oculus store est pas mal avec beaucoup d'exclusivité même si il manquent parfois d'intuitivité et d'algorithmes pour trouver de bon jeux. Par contre chose à savoir si vous changez de marque de casque vous ne pouvez pas récupérer vos jeux sur l'oculus store il vous faudra tout racheter.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 16 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Estos son cómodos a diferencia de las quest su diseño es más cómodo y más fácil de ajustar. Si tienes una pc de alta gama y quieres sacarle el mejor provecho y no te molesta estar conectado a ella, estos visores son para ti, aparte de que también hay una gran variedad de juegos con este visor y son más baratos
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 17 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Das Prinzip ist noch nicht ganz ausgereift. 90 % der Spiele über Oculus sind in Englisch. Vorhandene Spiele (z. B. The Forest) laufen nicht wirklich gut. Das Kabel könnte länger sein. Geht leider zurück und beobachten wie sich VR entwickelt.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 11 July 2019
review_title: Das Prinzip ist noch nicht ganz ausgereift

one_reviews_text: "Requires your Facebook account to log in" Either you missed it when you purchased it (last bullet point) or you had no idea about the controversy going on between Oculus and Facebook teaming up. If you don't have a Facebook account, you're forced to create one just to use this. This doesn't help with the fact how Facebook is mentioned nowhere else as a requirement until you try to setup an Oculus Account upon setting up for the first time. Don't want Facebook? Avoid this.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 3 November 2020

one_reviews_text: If you're buying it for something like VRChat, be warned that the Rift S has a common problem where the microphone will mess up, causing you to sound robotic. There seems to be no rhyme or reason why this happens, and only affects some headsets, but is common enough that most people know of the issue. There's been no fix for it, and it doesn't seem like there will be.Aside from that, I found the buttons a little too sensitive for me. Even just resting your finger against them counted as holding them down. The controller were comfortable to hold, though, and lightweight.The headset fit well enough and was more or less comfortable, if a bit heavy. I wear glasses and was able to wear it with them on well enough.Ultimately, if it wasn't for the microphone problems I would have kept it. I dealt with motion sickness as well, but that's something you can get over.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 19 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Acheter le 25 décembre 2020 soit 1 ans et 7 jours de  service mon casque oculus Rift S à un problème mon câble display port refuse de fonctionner alors que tout allait bien pas plus tard qu'hier certains diront que c'est mon pc où mes composants où accessoires où un problème de branchements mes non je suis sûr à 100 % que c'est le casque l'USB fonctionne très bien mes dès que j'essaie de brancher le display port il se connecte et déconnecte à chaque fois je les payer 250€ c'est pas donné et la quand je vois que si je devais éventuellement en racheter un autre ça me coûterait 1000 € SOIT LE PRIX DE 4 CASQUE OCULUS RIFT S je pense que vous pouvez enlever un zéro sérieux ?! Abusé je descends un peut mon évaluation
review_date: Reviewed in France on 2 January 2022
review_title: Problème au bout de 1 ans et 7 jours de service

one_reviews_text: Eine andere Welt verschiedene Flugsimulator en zu fliegen und zu trainieren für den Modellflug. Sehr realitätsnah, es entsteht tatsächlich dieses Bauchgefühl wenn man Manntragende Hubschrauber fliegt, wie in echt.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 10 February 2020

one_reviews_text: me ha gustado la sujeción de la diadema y la claridad con la que se ven los objetos que están cerca y no me ha gustado el audio porque me parece patético e inservible de lo mal que se oye , teniendo que ponerte unos cascos externos con la consiguiente incomodidad.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 21 November 2019
review_title: Me esperaba otra cosa mucho mejor

one_reviews_text: Cosa dire?! Che dovete provarlo se non avete mai usato un visore, solo quando lo indosserai e inizierai a giocare capirai quanto è bello e coinvolgente. Veramente da provare! Sto già pensando di comprare anche il quest!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 28 January 2020

one_reviews_text: While this is a great VR headset overall, it has some issues that led me to return it. First of all, speakers are very tiny and it doesn't cover your ear. While the build quality is good, its a bit heavy when you are wearing it. Also Oculus platform forces you to install proprietary software which I don't like but if you want to play exclusive games, this is your only option for now.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 26 March 2020
review_title: Oculus bringing VR to the masses

one_reviews_text: It worked for about 2 weeks before the right controller lost its tracking abilities, great headset, bad design. Would like a replacement for the right controller as it's the company's fault for the break. I shouldn't have to replace a faulty device. during the 2 weeks it worked it kept acting weird and throwing off the games. Turns out as I talked to more people there seems to be a lot of issues with the controllers for this specific product. The controllers have been kept in great condition; always placed in the box after every use and has never dropped or banged anything. Very disappointed and hope to hear back for a replacement of he right controller.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 18 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Ever since I bought the Rift-S I've been plagued with minor bugs that usually necessitate unplugging both the USB and DisplayPort plugs in order for it to properly function.Now it has completely died on me with the software being unable to detect the DisplayPort. I've uninstalled/reinstalled the Oculus software numerous times, all my drivers are up-to-date and I've performed numerous power cycle all to no avail.My report to Oculus Support has not been answered so I'm currently sitting with a $700 brick.Suffice to say, I'm frustrated by this
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 17 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Nothing but issues since unboxing. Image freezing and constant crashing on a brand new very high spec PC fully updated and running clean. Contacted oculus support and they have had me jumping through hoops for the last 2 months trying to fix. Don’t buy this get something else, I purchased solely for DCS World VR....Very disappointed to say the least, I will never buy another Oculus device ever again. PC Simulators have been my life! Never been so disappointed in a product or support.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 11 May 2020
review_title: Constant Image Freezing and Crashing a Disaster Device!

one_reviews_text: I received the Oculus Rift S and it is clearly an open box item.  The controllers are scuffed with dead batteries.  The lenses and sensors are suppose to have protected film and they did not.  Also usb and hdmi plug ends should have protective plastic caps which it did not.  Very deceiving paying full price for an open box product.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 10 January 2020
review_title: Open Box Item When Suppose to be New

one_reviews_text: This head set is amazing !only one cord.no screen effect pitcher is very nice better then the HTC ViveGood game librarySad I had to return it do to lack of room :(People to get the best VR experience you need room unless you doing driving games like racing, flying stuff like that.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Sapevo che come prodotto era eccellente comunque l'impatto che ho avuto, non avendo mai provato alcun tipo di visore , è stato devastante dopo solo 5 minuti di realtà virtuale ho capito di aver fatto bene a comprarlo 110 e lode.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 3 December 2020

one_reviews_text: The Oculus Rift S makes it easy for anyone to pickup PC VR and have it ready in just a few minutes without any problems all thanks to the rift s inside out tracking which is awesome. I also did a review over at my channel on youtube htpoint if you want to check out the video review also I bought this I didn't get this for free :)
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 19 June 2019
review_title: Best Oculus so far upgraded from the Rift cv1 to this

one_reviews_text: I was in a stage where I didn't know what VR headset to choose. I spent a great time considering the Oculus Quest however I settled with the Rift S.If your computer has the power I thoroughly recommend going with the S over the Quest.The games are better and you will have more game selections.I did have some concerns of the compatibility of the Rift S with other games provided by Vive and on steam.The Oculus Rift S has been able to play every game with minimal modification or tweaking.It will blow your mind. So in short, if you are a serious game go with the Rift S. The fact you don't have to set up sensors is an additional benefit.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 29 August 2019
review_title: Oculus Rift S was the right choice.

one_reviews_text: Emballage et service de livraison au top.L'oculus rift s était mon premier casque VR, niveau technologie et confort c'est vraiment top, l'expérience de la VR c'est tout de même quelque chose d'incroyable.Seulement voila, 450e c'est un investissement, et même avec des jeux comme No Man Sky, Elite Dangerous etc, j'ai personnellement une grande sensibilité au Motion Sickness (mal de crane et envie de vomir) en l'utilisant même assis, vraiment dommage, j'ai retourné le produit.Mais si vous cherchez un casque VR et voulez éviter 1000e vous ne serez pas déçu !
review_date: Reviewed in France on 25 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Needs to be set up regularly, as the room dimensions get lost, but it's quick and easy to set up. The pads around the face and head are foam, and should be upgraded to the non-foam (kiwi) ones for comfort. Works with the Oculus games as well as Steam games.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 3 February 2021
review_title: Easy to set up first time.

one_reviews_text: Das Gefühl jetzt im Raum zu stehen als davor mit Monitor ist überwätigend.Allein schon Google Earth...Hammer.Am besten mal bei einen Bekannten austesten...man wird begeistert sein.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 20 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Oculus Rift S is a capable VR experience. This was my first foray into true VR gaming (many years ago I tried Stereoscopic 3D glasses which provided a lo-fi 3D gaming experience)Initially I got motion sickness when I started to play VR but after repeated exposure... you find your "VR legs" and it becomes bearable.I'm running it on a Ryzen 1700 + GTX 1070. The games work flawlessly and they're really immersive.PROS:+ Great VR gaming experience+ Easy to set up and play (it's almost plug and play after installing the Oculus software and running Guardian setup)+ Lots of fun VR titles to choose fromCONS:- Sometimes the lenses can get foggy/smudgy which breaks immersion- The foam on the heaset will soak up sweat and it can get yucky (I don't know why the design team didn't think of a way to replace the foam easily)- The cord on the back needs a strap to feel more comfortable and out-of-the-way- Some people will feel motion sickness however this won't affect 100% of the population (also this can sometimes be overcome with repeated exposure so remember to take breaks)Would I recommend the Oculus Rift S to others looking to get into VR gaming? Absolutely!!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 29 December 2019

one_reviews_text: It is my first oculus buy. It's a bit complicated for me to adjust the headset perfectly because when I move a bit I start seeing blurry and If I adjust the wheel at the back too tight it kind of hurts. But other than that It's a good product.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 25 October 2020

one_reviews_text: For clarification I own a 3 sensor OG Rift setup that works on my PC.Bought my first Rift S and the headset wouldn't connect to my PC.  Returned it in exchange for a new one.  Second Rift S connects to PC but is not able to pair with controllers...Also consistent USB issues.  How on earth does my OG Rift setup that uses FOUR USB connections work but this headset with only one connection does not?  I cant even imagine how many people's first introduction to VR was ruined by the dreadful technical issues that the Rift S provides.So incredibly frustrating and disappointing.  I would like an upgraded VR experience. Valve or HTC here I come...
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 August 2019

one_reviews_text: This headset is very comfortable and I have been able to wear it for long periods of time.  I haven't had any eye strain issues either so that is good.  I do wear glasses normally and don't find any issues there either.  I don't need to wear my glasses.The only major issue that I've had is that sometimes the sensors and the controllers loose connection to the software and have to be re-paired to the computer.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 29 March 2021

one_reviews_text: Livraison rapide.Installation facile et rapide.Attention, un ami a rayé les lentilles avec ses lunettes...! Je n'ai pas de lunette et je crois qu'une personne avec lunette aurait de la misère à être confortable.Je ne regrette pas mon achat. La famille va capoter !
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 5 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Soy nuevo en la RV por lo que no puedo opinar respecto al rendimiento de otras gafas, pero en general por ahora todo positivo, tengo una nvidia 1060 y mueve adecuadamente todo lo que he probado. buena calidad de imagen y sobre todo muy inmersivo!!
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 24 June 2019
review_title: buen servicio, entrega dentro de lo esperado!!

one_reviews_text: Preislich etwas teurer aber gute Qualität.gliedert sich gut ins System eineinzig bei den Controllern sind die Batterien schnell entleert, weshalb man beinicht Benutzung die Batterien entnehmen sollte.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 8 July 2021

one_reviews_text: Improved design over original Oculus Rift. Easier to connect and doesn't need outside boundary cameras to set working VR box area. Only design issue is the lack of a sound pairing to a real headset. Built in speakers not up to par. Overall great VR gaming headset for less money.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 15 February 2020
review_title: Oculus Rift S is new wave for VR PC Gaming

one_reviews_text: Overall this is a great VR headset, quality build, quality features and quality software. A couple of issues I've come across are, windows doesn't recognise the headset on launch, this requires unplugging and re plugging the USB. I do have other peripherals, so maybe a power issue. The Guardian boundary is often forgotten and requires a new setup. All in all a good product, some issues that could be resolved with further research.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 29 December 2019

one_reviews_text: No pude ni probarlas. A parte de no traer instrucciones hay que conectarlas con una conexión DP, mas bien de consolas, y mi flamante PC con hdmi etc no se puede conectar.Creo que deberian de avisar de esos detalles, falta mucha información previa a la compra.Tengo que devolverlas sin siquiera probarlas, una pena.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 8 December 2019
review_title: No puedo conectarlas a mi PC

one_reviews_text: For the fact it doesn't have any sensors other than the cameras, this works SUPRISINGLY well. Just be aware that it can only track so much as the cameras can, so it can't track things like when you put your hands behind your back or when you obscure one controller with the other. This headset is great for casual VR experiences, but if you wan't top accuracy, get a headset with external sensors.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 7 March 2020
review_title: Make sure you do your research!

one_reviews_text: Amazing so much fun, very addictive, and Amazon shipping is so fast!! The only thing about the rift is didn't like one bit having to link your facebook acc to use it, and the fact it chunked the net so bad- that's not the rifts fault, it's the Australian internet omg it's so rubbish, so right now it's a very nice ornament on the shelf until the data clocks over for next month or till can move into an area to get unlimited data so can play it every day!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 7 January 2021
review_title: Amazing device had a great time using it.. till the net ran out

one_reviews_text: Finalmente staccarsi dai sensori di tracking , non più bloblemi di alimentazione delle porte usb. Veramente un altra vita, quando toglieranno il cavo sarà perfetto
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 17 July 2020

one_reviews_text: so when I got my rift s it worked perfectly with maybe a miner mic problem over a bit of time it started having problems that fix when I did the right things but more and more the problems changed and the fix stopped fixing the VR headset to the point I could not use it at all I contacted Oculus support it took 3 to 4 emails before they had the correct answer now I can use it when I do one of the troubleshooting tricks but the VR will cut out after little time of uses and the mic is really bad now I have to do the troubleshooting and the n set up again every time and it's not a guarantee it will work so I do not personally recommend this VR to anyone.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 11 May 2020

one_reviews_text: If you have a pc your gonna love it thanks to vr you don't need to sit all day you can stand in virtual reality and move around no need to worry about batterie cause it's connected to your pc I love it because makes education and and work more engaging.JUST BUY IT
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 16 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Muy bonito pero no lo pude usar.La razón es por que si tu tarjeta de video no tiene DisplayPort, mejor ni te esfuerces. No hay ninguna manera de poner un adaptador a HDMI. Oculus no lo permite, una lástima.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 4 February 2021
review_title: Únicamente DisplayPort, si no cuentas con el no funcionará

one_reviews_text: Producto de muy buena calidad, pero mucha atención con comprar este aparato sin mirar se tu laptop tiene la GPU intel junta con la entrada Mini DP, tiene que estar conectada de fabrica a la GPU dedicada!!
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 29 October 2019

one_reviews_text: il prodotto è ben rifinito, e l'esperienza di gioco è molto interessante, non passa a pieni voti solo per la limitata scelta di giochi interessanti. Il dispositivo lascia un senso di disorientamento e mal di testa a volte dopo l'utilizzo, a volte diverse ore dopo in base al tipo di gioco. Sensazione alla quale mano a mano ci si abitua.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 28 February 2022

one_reviews_text: Unstable product. Had to plug/unplug/restart multiple time every time to get the Oculus app to recognize the device.Work okay when it decide to work.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 30 September 2020

one_reviews_text: The Rift S is a decent VR headset, but it has a number of issues, mostly petty or irritating.The battery life in the handsets is poor, it forgets the play area regularly, one lens just seems to be ever-so-slightly off focus no matter how much I calibrate it, and the head strap doesn't seem to like the shape of my head for more than about 10 minutes. I'm also not a fan of having to create a Facebook account just in order to use it.That said, it is immersive, the sound quality is good and I'm enjoying playing Star Wars Squadrons on it.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 23 October 2020

one_reviews_text: First experience with vr, Great product easy to setup and use and runs great on a rtx 2060. Just make sure you get a proper cleaning cloth for the lenses as the lens covers it comes with for shipping leave a smudge, I thought vr was just really blurry or it was the (screen door effect) Nope. After a few days of playing I thought I would look at the lenses and they had smudges all over from the plastic peel off shipping covers, Now it's so clear and the sweet spot on this is great not only can i look around by turning my head i can even move my eyes around a bit too inside the goggles.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 14 May 2020
review_title: My first experience with vr, It was way better than i'd imagined

one_reviews_text: Seriously can't be more happy with this VR set. Had oculus go for a while but this is a whole different view. You have to have a powerful PC of couse but the cable didn't realy get in the way of playing much. Only thing that needs to change a bit here is the handles... come on make them a little longer...I have an average size hand and it was small for me. Need some grip too. Had to buy off market handle cover to make it work for beat saber, or they just keep slipping off..... Oculus if you can improve your handle it is almost a perfect gear!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 9 September 2020
review_title: Your entrance to the VR world

one_reviews_text: Compared to the former version, the S impresses with a wider field of view and better resolution. The camera based build-in tracking capabilities are great and surprisingly accurate, and I loved the way the virtual fence you set up in the beginning has been realized. It works well and if you stick your head through the fence the cameras show the real word. Need a faster graphics card, but was impressed with the experience using this product!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 16 June 2019

one_reviews_text: Mein PC :CPU Intel 7RAM : 32 GBGrafikkarte : Nvidia RTX 2060Müsste doch reichen das alles stabil läuft, oder ?Tat es aber leider nicht.Preis - Leistungsverhältnis mangelhaft.Habe jetzt die "Oculus Quest" und bin sehr zufrieden !
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 24 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Crise de nerf en perspective. Aucun driver disponible. Usb reconnu une fois sur 4 (4redemarrage avec et sans usb connecté) Service Client méprisant quant il y a en un et qui vous facture, même quant ça ne fonctionne pas, obligation de s'inscrire à Facebook avec toutes les autorisations sur vos contacts, votre disque dur, une Arnaque incroyable, avec quelques soft de 2016 gratuit. Déplorable. Renvoie du "produit" à mes frais.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 21 February 2021
review_title: usb ne fonctionne une fois sur quatre

one_reviews_text: Die Rift S ist derzeit was Preis/Leistung angeht einfach unschlagbar was PC VR angeht.Die Software würd kontinuierlich entwickelt und es gibt durchaus noch einige Bugs.Dennoch ist die Rift S ein sehr solides und einfach zu installierendes VR Headset.Wer keine 1000€ für VR ausgeben möchte und einen halbwegs aktuellen PC hat, bekommt hier was wirklich vernünftiges für ein Geld.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 7 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Although I am sure this product works well, it is no polished enough to be compatible with many computers, and there is not enough information out to be able to identify if your pc is compatible. I recently purchased one and had to return it because it turned out although my laptop specs fitted all the specified requirements, there was a hidden requirement - your laptop or pc display must be linked to your gpu directly, otherwise it will not work. Make sure your laptop/pc fits this requirement otherwise it will not work! This is because of the new design choice of not allowing hdmi only computers. Good luck.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 27 December 2019

one_reviews_text: OMG... I just stepped into an alternate world, fended myself off from zombie with Rick Grimes level of badassery... After that I stepped back in time and took on an army of sword wielding dummies with daggers and lightning. Put down the drugs, time to get into some Vr.In all seriousness, I've done a crazy amount of research and the rift s came in second best... First being the valve index but that's a $600 difference give or take. Freaking love this tech, no issues setting this bad boy up as i exceeded system requirements.Being a gamer for 32 years, with confidence I can say that this is the future of gaming.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 8 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Hin und wieder kommt es trotz voller Batterien zu einer kleinen Orientierungslosigkeit der Controller, wodurch Fehler im Spiel dem technischen Versagen zugeordnet werden können.In etwa 2 Jahren (wenn ich mich richtig erinnere), wenn Facebook Pflicht wird, muss ich mir wohl eine neue VR-Brille suchen, aber bis dahin grandioses Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 28 October 2020

one_reviews_text: This headset is awesome but we have 3 computers in our house and it worked on literally none of them for more then 5 minutes. This was easily fixed by buying a pcie usb hub that specifically has the Fresco L1100 chipset. But from looking around on Reddit this seems to be a pretty common problem and it really isnt acceptable on a consumer product for this price. Oculus support tried to replace my headset but even that doesnt fix this problem because it's caused by the oculus software as sometimes updates will completely break the tracking on some usb ports.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 11 May 2020
review_title: Great headset with horrible usb compatability and software.

one_reviews_text: After have had using a rift cv1 for a bit I can say I am not disappointed in the rift s, the inside out tracking is amazing, speakers aren't so good. Clarity is way better then the rift my eye fit on any ipd on the orginal rift so this one wasnt an issue. The headband does seem to need re adjusting time to time.  Currently using a ryzen 5 3600 combined with 16 gb of ram ddr4 1050ti 4gt oc from msi. Runs great.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 23 November 2020

one_reviews_text: Lo he tenido que devolver después de dos meses ya que tenía un problema con el micrófono. El problema es que después  de media hora más o menos dejaba de funcionar. Amazon como siempre ha estado a la altura y no ha puesto ningún tipo de problema para la devolución.Las he comprado de nuevo y van de lujo!
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 23 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Buenas gafas VR las pille de oferta, bien aprovechadas en los simuladores DCS, Xplane, etc y en juegos  como Onward, paulov, Half life Alix.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 24 April 2020

one_reviews_text: I bought this product a few months ago, I didn't play much because summer made it too hot to play. It was working just fine but recently I put it on my head and nothing. Sensors just don't work anymore and i've tried everything the company told me to. Now they don't even want to refund me or replace it. Not even a year and this piece of garbage breaks down out of the blue and I barely used it and never dropped/hit it.Worked well, WHEN IT DID.Buy a something else if you can afford it.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 21 January 2021

one_reviews_text: I tried to replace my fault controller but the Oculus customer team always gave me same copy and paste answer. I tried to contact them 5 times over 8 weeks to solve this controller issue. Now they don't reply to my email.Well. Please learn from what EVGA and Corsair are doing to customers. I would never purchase anything from this Brand.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 27 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Not bad. However, this device can be a pain in the neck if you're not using the latest video card.I lost count of how many times I had to restart the application, pulling out and plugging usb , hdmi cables. I wish connecting it was a bit less cumbersome
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 9 October 2020
review_title: Lots of fun...But the software is a bit temperamental!

one_reviews_text: From a purely VR standard, it is quite good, but for gaming, even for my mid range setup; core i7 8700k nividia gtx1060 and 16gb of ram, the performance was laughable, the experience was good for some games: beatsaber, Job simulator, etc. Other games, superhot, H3VR, and space pirate sim didnt do so well. Long story short, make sure you've got a computer, that can handle it, no ifs ands or buts. Make sure your computer is better than the recommended specs on oculus' own website
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 August 2020
review_title: Make a computer that is better than the recommended specs

one_reviews_text: Was a bit hesitant to purchase this as I didn't think it would be much of an upgrade from the CV-1. Definitely wrong on that one. It is so much clearer and I'm glad I upgraded.Only real problem is has is that it doesn't always connect when the computer boots up but I may have to change the usb 3 card to the Inatek card which I'll probably do later. For now I just unplug and replug the usb and display port connections if it doesn't connect first time.Edit 25/2 : Purchased the Inatek card and installed it using Windows drivers. Connected the Rift S and it now works flawlessly, no more unplugging and replugging the usb and DP cords.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 10 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Apparte la prima volta di utilizzo che mi ha dato un po' di disorientamento nelle profondità per il resto è perfetto con un i7 e una gtx 1060 la uso con risoluzione media bassa gira molto bene.un po' scomodo il cavo che più di una volta mi è stato d' intralcio ma l' installazione e la configurazione sono stati facili e veloci
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 13 January 2021

one_reviews_text: The video quality is much better than CV1, although by today's standards it's going from unacceptable to just acceptable.  Not having to set up external cameras is great and make it so much simpler to use.However, the audio is atrocious.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 24 July 2020

one_reviews_text: Buen Visor de rv calidad-precio.Lo bueno: software, punto dulce, poco efecto rejilla, poco glare i los touch.Lo malo: sonido pobre, sin ajuste interpupilar, negros grisaceos, cable rigido i poco fov.Tengo varios visores i para mi lo malo es grave, pero si eres nuevo en vr lo malo no te importara...
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 27 September 2019

one_reviews_text: This thing is fun. I was expecting the sound to be really bad due to all the negative reviews about it, but it really is not bad at all. Even in Beatsaber it sounds good. Tracking works really well. No screen door effect and super easy setup. If you are on the fence, DO IT, JUST DO IT!!
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 7 February 2020

one_reviews_text: This is a great purchase if you're looking to delve straight into VR and experience it for the first time. For its price, it is very high quality and well worth the purchase. Initially, I was looking into the HTC Cosmos or Vive Pro but as it turns out, the Rift S was significantly better in terms of resolution and screen door effect. I questioned how something so well made was sold for such an amazing price. I've had the Rift S for about 3 weeks now and there has been no issues at all. My only complaint would be the tracking as it does not work in the dark and can sometimes be finicky and not track properly.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Facil De Usar, Ya Que Practicamente No Requiere Setup(Solo Unas Configuraciones Para El Area De Juego), Compatible Con Los Juegos De Terceros(Steam, Etc), Como Se Espera Los Materiales Son De Muy Buena Calidad, Tambien Muy Comodo De Usar Aunque Suda El Area Que Toca El Rostro, Pero Eso Es Normal Con Todos Los Headsets, Las Baterias Incluidas Duran Muy Poco, No Se Si Sea Por El Requerimiento Energetico De Los Controles O Si Solo Sean De Baja Calidad XD. En General Muy Complacido Con Mi Compra!
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 5 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Originally I wanted to use this on my laptop, but it turned out the miniDP I had on my Metabox gaming laptop only connected to the integrated GPU. After ordering a USBC to DisplayPort adapter I was able to connect it to my laptop successfully. Was using it on my main PC for a few days and had a blast. Then my controllers went out of battery and i'm current writing a review while they charge :P
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 29 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Great value for money. There was no sound in my left speaker after connecting. I updated everything drivers software. I turned out it is just 3,5mm jack not pushed all way in socket that connect speakers with cable from PC. You will need to detach facecover to get access to that 3,5mm jack and seat it properly. Sound is not great, but good enough to not have to wear headphones at least for me.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 26 December 2019

one_reviews_text: el producto funciona y es mas o menos lo esperado, parece tener algunos errores de imagen en ocasiones, supongo que es por lo mismo del hardware o software que al detener la app y volverla a iniciar funciona bien de nuevo, los típicos errores de sofware nada mas.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 30 November 2020

one_reviews_text: Smaller 'sweet spot' for visual fidelity, more blur, and you're stuck fighting with oculus' overpriced and less intuitive store instead of just using Steam with the same ease. You can, of course, but it's an extra hassle.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 24 August 2019
review_title: Half the price of competitors. Half the quality.

one_reviews_text: forse il mio pc non era perfettamente compatibile. Funzionava ma i controller davano problemi rendendo ingiocabili le applicazioni
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 30 October 2020

one_reviews_text: Crashes with a black screen with orange light after using for 20-30 mins. RTX2070, 16 GB RAM, i7 9th genReinstalled everything multiple times. Followed the instructions of many online gurus. Bought a powered USB hub. Still no luck. Didnt even last a year.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 19 September 2021

one_reviews_text: Estos HMD llegaron antes de lo esperado, la calidad es muy buena, estuve investigando y estos visores son lo mejor que puedes obtener por tu dinero, la calidad gráfica es mucho mejor que su anterior versión y para lo que yo lo utilizo (sim racing) van perfectos!
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 16 February 2020
review_title: Excelente relación precio/calidad, muy satisfecho con la compra!

one_reviews_text: L'immersione è totale.. migliorata la risoluzione rispetto al modello precedente, ma l'audio ha bisogno di cuffie supplementari se si vuole la completa unione con la visione. Molto comodo da indossare.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 7 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Avere un oculus non è un must, però è un ottimo sfizio, nel mio caso è diventato monotono dopo circa 3 mesi di utilizzo ma lo uso ancora occasionalmente
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 11 April 2021

one_reviews_text: If he must play computer games then standing up and moving around is better than just sitting still.  My son has had loads of fun.  So much so my other son asked for one for his birthday.  They play with their friends online and chat to them whilst they are playing.  Would like more games available via Steam. Great bit of kit and well made.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 5 January 2020
review_title: My 11 yo loves it (as does my husband)

one_reviews_text: I would have loved this headset if the lens IPD (distance between pupils) was mechanically adjustable.While the Oculus software offers software IPD adjustment, it does not compensate for the physical position of the lens relative to you eyes. If your pupils are outside the optimal distance, you get reduced FOV and blurriness which can lead to eye strain and nausea.I highly recommend that you measure your IPD and check it against the optimal IPD range (61.5 and 65.5mm) before getting a Rift S.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 15 August 2020

one_reviews_text: The products exceeds our expectations! We bought the headset for our small office - and we've tested both the Rift and Vive models before. The install was really easy, no need for a room setup, guardian system and passthru feature are extremely useful and we are all on the same page: Rift S is light, works well, easy adjustable (we keep changing the headset settings) and you still setup your account without a FB login ;)
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 23 September 2019

one_reviews_text: As soon as I set the device up I kept getting BSOD's, I tried everything on the recommended advice area of Oculus' website but nothing worked. Until I came across an obscure forum online that one of the newest driver updates for AMD broke it, I uninstalled my driver and went back to the previous version and it was working like a charm. Still does until this day for the past month.Unsure if any future AMD drivers are going to fix this but it has happened to a few people. Good thing to keep in mind if you've also got this problem.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 12 August 2020
review_title: Arrived with Black Screen of Death but fixed with AMD driver rollback.

one_reviews_text: Después de 10 meses el dispositivo deja de funcionar, fallo muy común en el cable de estas gafas, y Oculus no tiene stock de repuestos .. estando en garantía. Dos meses sin poder usarlas y sin previsión de solución... Lamentable, no repetiré
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 6 January 2022

one_reviews_text: I tried a few VR options and this the best option if you take pc gaming(and already have good gaming pc) seriously and VR gaming with Oculus Rift S is the highest standard in this regard. Even if you buy a pc now it's still worth it, the graphics are just WOW
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 21 August 2019

one_reviews_text: I have been monitoring all the vr headset for few years alrdy. This product I feel like would be the top one overall wise. But still the whole VR market is not fully developed yet. might still need a few years.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 3 October 2020

one_reviews_text: die brille ist super top das spielen macht viel spaß aber sie ist nichts für uninformierte leute den das wichtigste der maximale augenabstand der hier eingestellt werden kann ist nicht sehr hoch also ist die brille für leute die allgemein groß sind nichts weil man sonnst alles verschwommen sieht  ansonnsten sehr gutes stück technick
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 30 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Prodotto di ottima fattura e di qualità.I controller sono davvero ergonomici leggeri e molto intuitivi.Il casco è davvero comodo e regolabile in molte situazioni.adatto a chi porta gli occhiali e a qualsiasi ergonomia.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 21 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Dont bother buying Rift S, just go and buy quest if you really wan to get into VR, bought this in 2019 and since then, there has never been any new features updated. Facebook just updates quest/quest 2 only as its the best selling product. What a waste of money, and disappointment i'll never buy another facebook product ever again.
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 26 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Je possède le casque depuis 2 mois environ, c'est ma première expérience avec la VR.Je trouve le casque plutôt confortable, et les enceintes intégrées (enfin écouteurs diront certains) me suffisent personnellement. Pas de soucis pour jouer, et discuter en même temps sur discord.Le tracking de la tête est très bon, mais attention, il faudra de la lumière dans votre VR room pour être fonctionnel.D'un point de vue image, je trouve ça très correct sans être transcendant. Cependant il a fallu un peu de réglages dans mes différents jeux pour arriver au résultat qui me convenait (le compromis FPS / définition).Je trouve les Touch plutôt bien foutus, ils captent quand les doigts sont posés ou non sur les boutons, et la précision du tracking est vraiment au top (pour viser par exemple).Pour le prix je suis donc pleinement satisfait.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 30 September 2019
review_title: Surement le meilleur rapport qualité prix
