one_reviews_text: È il mio primo visore VR e devo dire che penso sia davvero ottimo. Non ho notato problemi di traking ed il visore è partito appena collegato al pc (avevo l'app oculus già installata). Se avete un pc che lo supporta non fatevi scoraggiare dalle recensioni negative!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 8 June 2019
review_title: Ottimo prodotto per iniziare a sperimentare la VR

one_reviews_text: Altamonte recomendado el headset, me llego antes de tiempo y muy bien empaquetado.Hace un anio me.construi una computadora especificamente para entrar  Al mundo de vr. Escucho a muchos decir que hay varios headers mil veces mejores que oculus, pero si es tu primer experiencia con un headset de vr, creme, te va a explorer la cabeza, es una experiencia fenomenal a un precio de entrada razonable con el descuento que tuvieron.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 11 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Apparently a common problem with sensor tracking, essentially I cannot even get this thing setup from scratch. Followed the help and advice from many Google searches and also sought support from Occulus who sent me a list of things to do telling me to try different apps - I cannot even get the initial setup !!!If I could return I will which is my next step
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 17 February 2021
review_title: Already wasted too much time on this

one_reviews_text: Loads of fun, the game library has something for everyone!The Rift S is very user friendly, just plug into the desktop, put on the headset and follow the simple instructions to get set up.Be aware, that at first you might get very tired playing VR games if you aren't used to it, but it is a lot of fun and incredibly immersing.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 15 October 2020
review_title: Easy to use and set up

one_reviews_text: What an experience. I'm talking from the pov of Dad. My kids urged my to get one for my art show "ghosts of graffit" and boy am I glad I did. Within 5 minutes I was using kingsprsy Graff app and painting a local wall...seriously amazing. As a dad I'm also drawn to providing these experiences to folks of advanced age or invalid. Being able to do without being there exceeds the miracles of water to wine (which actually made the good water unusable) and provides and instant new existence without expected barriers. As long as the ethics stay pointed towards overall good, I praise the innovators of this tech and the uncertain future they daily tread.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 24 October 2019

one_reviews_text: I brought the VR as a novitaly, however after using the Oculus rift s I have enjoyed it way more then i had expected too. Overall it performs wonderfully with my pre existing setup and has an easy installation process. Isn't the widest variety of games available to play but there are some gems. As someone with an affinity for motion sickness I through the experience would be less than enjoyable however there are games labeled with levels of user comfort to assist with this.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 3 November 2020

one_reviews_text: L'installateur du logiciel n'est qu'un client qui télécharge les 12Go de l'installation et il a une forte tendance à geler pendant le téléchargement. Quand ça arrive, la seule chose à faire est de l'arrêter de force et le relancer. Le client reprendra alors l'installation depuis LE DÉBUT. J'ai passer plus d'une journée à télécharger ça sur la connexion de mon téléphone car ma connexion filaire est instable.Puis un beau jour, je lance le logiciel Oculus qui me demande de le mettre à jour puis de mettre à jour mes manettes et là, surprise. Les manettes refuses de synchroniser, pas moyen de revenir à la version précédente du logiciel.Je ne recommanderai pas ce casque non-plus pour la détection des manettes, souvent le casque perd les manettes de vue. Pas terrible pour les jeux du genre beat saber ou autre.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 6 January 2020
review_title: Le logiciel Oculus est une horreur

one_reviews_text: Es hat am Anfang nicht funktionirt und ich wollte sie schon zurückschicken aber es lag an unsere Graphikkarte.Ich habe sie aktualisiert und jetzt läuft alles wunderbar.Mein Sohn ist begeistert.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 5 July 2020

one_reviews_text: Great upgrade to the original riftVery comfortable, much better display and tracking is almost flawless.Not having over ear headphones is actually a plus for me. I like being able to hear outside world sounds too.This is the best pc tethered vr experience available today period.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 24 May 2019

one_reviews_text: Questo prodotto è esattamente come me lo aspettavo, la risoluzione e alta precisione del tracking, permette di godere un esperienza VR altamente immersiva.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 31 December 2019
review_title: Consigliato se intendete immergervi nel mondo VR

one_reviews_text: This worked great for literally 3 days.  After that, the Oculus app decided to just stop working, rendering the entire device useless. THREE DAYS. I'm getting rid of this hot garbage and trading it in for something that will actually f***ing work.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 22 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Very good! So fun. I have a small head but it was very comfortable. Hubby has a larger head but he said it was a great fit!
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 7 March 2020
review_title: Gift for my son. Mom win 4 sure!

one_reviews_text: The rift s is a very good entry level vr rig for newcomers on pc. Easy to set up.No sensors to worry about.Just make sure your pc meets all recommended specs.Its a great upgrade from psvr if a little less comfortable out of the box.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 12 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Kontroller und Headset waren dreckig. Als ich sie säuberte und anfing das Headset einzurichten rauschte der linke Lautsprecher der Brille sehr laut so das es schon weh tat. Dieses Rauschen ging auch nicht mehr weg weshalb ich die Brille zurückschickte
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 12 May 2020

one_reviews_text: Spent a week troubleshooting issues that were occuring with this thing because the sound wasn't working at all. Got a new PC (was planning on a new one before buying this) and issues were fixed; for 3 weeks. Right speaker doesn't work at all anymore, and now the microphone is broken (sounds like I have a bad robot filter on my voice. You can't understand what I'm saying). Going to try and get a replacement from Oculus since I can't get one on Amazon anymore.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 8 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Difficile à bien configurer, il fait planter souvent le jeu, impossible de lire les  cadrans lorsque en fonction, le prix est trop dispendieux pour la qualité.. très lourd et trop chaud lorsque sur la tête.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 26 July 2020

one_reviews_text: Bought this a month ago and already sunk hundreds of hours into it. I love my Rift S and probably will continue to buy Oculus for some time to come.Previously owned a PSVR, and work in a VR escape room company that uses HTC Pro. I am more impressed with the ease of this product over anything I have come across. The quest is really neat, but if you have a decent PC, buy a Rift S!!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 6 January 2020
review_title: Fabulous product if you own a meaty PC

one_reviews_text: I love the rift s. It’s perfect for my needs, however I docked 2 stars for amazon having sent me an open box product that had clearly seen some use (plastic films on screens inside the headset peeled off, instruction manual ripped open, cords rewrapped and tossed lazily into the box). I paid full price for a “new condition” product and got something that, for all I knew upon opening, was faulty and had been returned.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 5 March 2021
review_title: Purchased “new” at full price and recieved used product

one_reviews_text: The rift s setup routine is a million times easier than classic Rift. The lower frame rate is hardly noticeable but the better resolution is very noticeable. I have heard and kind of agree that if you already own a classic Rift the Rift S would not necessarily be an upgrade but if you travel with your virtual reality set up as much as I do it's a serious Improvement.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 4 August 2019
review_title: The best headset to buy if it's your first one

one_reviews_text: Ottimo prodotto qualità prezzo ma usando solo giochi di guida, è poco fluido e la qualità dell’immagine non è il massimo. Pensavo molto meglio onestamente.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 29 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Il visore e ottimo, con buona qualità video e tracking. L'unica cosa e che bisogna stare attenti se si usano gli occhiali in quanto sono molto vicini ai vetri e potrebbero graffiare le lenti del visore. Consiglio di comprare fin da subito protezioni per i vetri
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 25 September 2020

one_reviews_text: It was very troublesome to setup and I had the parts required or better and it was quite laggy and the graphics were not that great.Eventually the hand sticks would glitch out and get stuck in the ground and you would have to unplug the oculus delete it from the oculus app and reinstall the oculus into the app every damn time this happened which was quite a bit so I refunded due to these and other problems
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 28 January 2021
review_title: Buy if your willing to live with inconvenient problems

one_reviews_text: After a day of messing around with the HMV after consistently have connection issues, I’ve managed to get the device working, so long as it is not plug in when my computer is powered on, and the display port is plugged in only after the USB has been plugged in and the device status LED turns on
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 2 April 2020

one_reviews_text: Overall opinion its a great VR. The only issue is it sometimes does not like to work at first, and you have to mess with it to get it to work. That part is definitely a pain, but for the most part it works great.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 4 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Ce casque est d'une immense déception dans tous les points. N’étant pas un expert en VR et n'ayant jusqu'alors essayé que l'Oculus Rift, les défauts du S sont palpables à vue d’œil.- Premièrement, le matériel : le casque est plutôt simple et agréable a porter mais à peine sorti de la boite on rencontre notre premier problème : le casque n'a aucun capteur. Cela ne serait pas dérangeant si ça ne posait pas de problème mais la spatialisation est IMMONDE par moment, nous téléportant de partout sans qu'on n'y puisse rien et fichant en l'air notre partie de Beat Saber ou FNaF, par exemple.- Autre point négatif qui découle du premier : étant donné que seules les caméras sur le casque spatialisent les manettes, il suffit d'un mauvais angle pour que celles ci se barrent a plusieurs mètres, spécialement quand les batteries sont faibles.- En parlant des batteries, les manettes marchent aux piles, ce qui, en plus de provoquer beaucoup de pollution, nous oblige toutes les deux heures de jeu à mettre en pause notre partie, aller en chercher, se rendre compte que on a plus de AAA et être obligé d'aller en acheter. Et si vous avez le malheur de jouer encore un peu avec des batteries en dessous des 25%, préparez vous à subir des déconnections reconnections, des bugs de manettes, des lags et j'en passe. Et si vous voulez déconnecter vos manettes tout en laissant votre casque branché, votre seule option est de retirer les piles !- Maintenant le logiciel : encore une fois à peine le casque lancé on vous demande de vous connecter à un compte Facebook, ou à en créer un si on en à pas. Je sais que Oculus appartient à Facebook mais quand même, ils auraient pu faire un effort.- En suite, quelque chose de plutôt secondaire mais le "hub" Oculus est hyper mal foutu : les touches sont différentes de celles de tous les autres jeux, on déplace des meubles dans le vouloir et on fini par abandonner ce hub.- En revanche, le menu principal est sobre, simple, ergonomique, rien à redire là dessus.- Enfin, ayant eu un pépin avec mon casque au début, je contacte le service client Oculus. Si celui ci semble compétant aux premiers abords, ça serait oublier le fait que c'est une personne différente qui vous traite à chaque message échangé. Ainsi, on m'a demandé plusieurs fois la même chose, on a ensuite mal compris mon problème puis on m'a suggéré de désinstaller et réinstaller TOUT le logiciel Oculus (qui soi dit en passant m'avais pris un jour à télécharger).Conclusion : si le casque est plutôt bon, il regorge de défauts qui vous donneront envie de le fracasser violemment au sol tout en lui demandant pourquoi tant de haine.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 24 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Plusieurs problemes mineur qui son corriger par dautre compagnie/model.telque (HTC Vive, HTC Vive pro , HTC Cosmos Elite, Valve Index)
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 27 August 2020
review_title: VR du pauvre ou non initié

one_reviews_text: Eccezionale, ovviamente avrete bisogno di un ottimo computer per usufruire di tutta la potenza di questo casco, lo consiglio vivamente.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 10 November 2020

one_reviews_text: Lo  uso con flight simulator 2020 , eccezionale il realismo.Nota bene da installare anche le OPEN XL per far funzionare il visore con simulator.Occorre un pc molto potente con scheda grafica ad alte prestazioni.Buon divertimento
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 8 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Juste wow.  Reçu très rapidement, qualité AAA.  Très facile d’utilisation et permet le room scaling.  Je recommande d’utiliser un système d’attache de câble car ça peux devenir dérangeant.  Si vous avez le PC pour utiliser ce casque alors ceci est parfait.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 22 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Al desembalar el producto, me extrañó no encontrar las pilas. (estaban dentro de los mandos).  había unas cajitas de cartón abiertas y sin nada dentro.  Llevo 2 días usándolas y ya he tenido que cambiar la pila del mando derecho.El aparato funciona bien. ( al menos es lo que creo, porque no he tenido otro para comparar), pero no me parece serio que se envíe un aparato como nuevo, cuando no lo es.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 2 September 2019
review_title: ESTAS GAFAS YA HAN SIDO USADAS...

one_reviews_text: Wow! Bought the Oculus Rift S specifically for DCS (Digital Combat Simulations).  Flying an F-16 fighter in VR is out of this world - close to being in the actual cockpit.  Closest flight reality experience I've ever had.  Outside of DCS, I am looking forward to more content beyond first person shooter games; content that explores VR in a broader scale.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 25 November 2019

one_reviews_text: All in One unico nel suo genere. Il processore fa' il suo dovere. Lo store Oculus per ora é l'unico da dove scaricare le app.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 12 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Do not buy! It will make you sick!I've been sick for maybe over a month now from this thing. I've used it three time before returning it, I've been going through terrible, unreal symptoms which I can't even begin to list! Buyer beware, this technology can have adverse effects and the worst part about it is that everyone will experience these symtoms differently. Please head my warning!
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 17 April 2021
review_title: Made me sick for over a month!

one_reviews_text: Tja, hab eigentlich nicht viel zu sagen.Technik funktioniert wie erwartet einwandfrei. Wenn man sich auf VR einlässt ist es großartig!Langsam drücken entsprechende Spiele auf den Markt um die Kosten der Technik zu verkraften. Meine Oculus kommt seit dem Kauf nicht zum Einstauben. Hab mir jetzt aber noch Silikonummantelung gekauft für das Headset und die Controller.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 15 January 2020

one_reviews_text: The only 2 bad things i can say is at first on beat Saber i kept bringing up the menu and opening the battery cover. after about 2 days muscle memory adapted to the controller to fix that. After about 2 weeks (And if i'm honest a tug or 2 at it) the outer foam cover is coming off. nothing a little bit of glue won't fix. No Doom VFR on oculus unfortunately but apart from that all good.Excellent packaging and delivery timeexcellent frames from modified beat saber to Pavlov and beyond on a 2080 Supe/ I5 9400F system.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 13 March 2020
review_title: Works great once you get used to it. Min cosmetic issue

one_reviews_text: So I received the Rift S but both controllers are heavily scratched with one covered in what looked like grease or oils from a person's hand. The Headset itself looks fine. The box was also scuffed up.
review_date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 21 November 2020
review_title: Received but pretty sure its second hand

one_reviews_text: Cambio recensione oculus va benissimo.. Ho avuto problemi con usb risolti poi con scheda aggiuntiva..... Assistenza tecnica totalmente incapace... Mi spiace che nn abbiano gente che capisca un minimo di informatica
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 20 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Now that Facebook has bought Oculus you must have an active facebook account in order to be able to use the VR headset. If for some reason your Facebook account gets a ban (which is becoming more and more common) you can't use your VR headset. Also Facebook will be canceling all Oculus developer accounts that have not been linked to a Facebook account by 2023. Stay away from Oculus.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 16 April 2021

one_reviews_text: For a couple of years audio worked fine if poorly. Now it cuts out completely and makes games stutter.Also the right controller which were well cared for cracked. It's a extremely common occurance from what I have seen online.Do your research and be careful with Occulus/Facebook vr headsets.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 13 March 2021

one_reviews_text: Muy contento. Fácil de instalar. Muy buena calidad. Con VR los juegos son otro mundo. Sobre todo en el simracing. El único pero es que los mandos se comen las pilas. Es recomendable comprar pilas recargables.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 13 February 2021
review_title: Perfecto producto para disfrutar de la VR

one_reviews_text: A decently priced VR headset, just make sure your GPU is up to snuff and has 2x display ports if you're using one for your monitor. Works great with 5700xt. I am happy with this purchase.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 18 February 2020

one_reviews_text: This is an old out dated item. A pain to setup difficult to use I wish I returned... oculus Quest 2 is amazing and the only device that should be being sold currently.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 30 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Acquisto fatto come regalo a mio marito. Considerato il fatto che non l’ho più visto per tre giorni direi che il prodotto è molto valido ed è stato apprezzato. Spedizione perfetta nei tempi.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 2 January 2021

one_reviews_text: If you are looking for a very good VR headset for PC gaming this one is a very good option for the price.it is a small upgrade from the first riff but if you don't own a riff and you are looking for a VR headset below 600$ this is the best option.I recommend using a pair of headphone because the small speaker that is defaulted on the headset are really bad but you do have a 3.5 mm jack on the headset.the headset is very comfortable whit glasses and fits perfectly (i do have a small pair of glasses though not sure for the big one. )
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 11 August 2019
review_title: best pc vr headset for the price

one_reviews_text: Finally after many months of buying a new video card then a bigger tower to accomodate video card we were finally able to attach VR headset only to find that it indeed does not work, really pissed off, sensor check conituously fails, googled it and have tried so many different options and still does not work
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 28 December 2020

one_reviews_text: Vale la pena el precio.Cabe resaltar que esta versión funciona ÚNICAMENTE si tienes una pc con una tarjeta gráfica medianamente decente.Obviamente los juegos se venden aparte, pero el sistema de localización espacial sin sensores externos es magnifico.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 3 January 2020
review_title: Recuerden que este modelo necesita una pc para ser jugado

one_reviews_text: primer casco vr que tengo y la verdad la experiencia es muy buena, lo unico que si es necesario comprar varios accesorios para protegerlo y no me gusto que no trae ninguna opcion para apagarlo, siempre esta en reposo asi que lo mejor es desconectarloenvio rapido, llego impecablemente bien la caja sin ningun tipo de golpe
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 21 March 2020

one_reviews_text: L'oculus rift S'est à mon sens le meilleur casque du marché (rapport qualité-prix) pour une première expérience VR.L'utilisation et l'installation du casque se font en quelques minutes : Port USB 3 et Display Port et le paramétrage très aisé grâce aux outils Oculus à installer sur PC.Le casque et les contrôleurs sont très confortables ntoament sur les sessions longues de jeu et les finitions satisferont le plus grand nombre.Pas trop lourd et ajustable sur 3 paramètres (serrage, proximité de la vitre et profondeur) le casque du rift S permet une belle immersion en VR grâce à une belle résolution affichée à 2560 x 1440 pixels.La longueur du câble est largement suffisante pour vous permettre de vous agiter sans trop vous prendre les pieds dedans et les dragonnes incluses dans le pack sont plus que suffisantes pour sécuriser les contrôleurs.En résumé je recommande très largement l'oculus rift S pour une première expérience VR qui est à ce jour le meilleur compromis en matière de qualité et de prix !
review_date: Reviewed in France on 3 July 2020
review_title: Très bon casque pour commencer la VR

one_reviews_text: Sitzt gut und kaum fliegengittereffekt.Sehr präzises tracking aber leider oft noch bugs in der software. Es gibt aber regelmäßig updates.Wenn es denn funktioniert eine echt gute alternative zur teuren vive. Ich finde die bildschirme sogar etwas besser.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 17 August 2019

one_reviews_text: SDE was greatly reduced. Have not encountered tracking issues and I honestly prefer it over CV1 (I don’t play onward or pav). Headset feels a bit cheap, but it is likely due to weight minimisation. I like the fact that I can sit across the room on my couch to watch movies in VR or on my bed whereas before, I had to move the sensors. Oculus could have created a better headset, but it doesn’t mean this one is not great compared to other VR headsets.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 11 June 2019

one_reviews_text: Fantastico e maneggevole, la qualità del prodotto è ottima, imballaggio perfetto, la qualità video è buona e la connettività semplice e veloce
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 13 April 2021

one_reviews_text: So disappointed 2 headsets both faulty, the fist had a dead pixel and the second continually lost tracking in the left controller. I tried all the fixes for the tracking issue, including spending more money in a powered USB hub....no fix.Now I have a library of games with no headset to play them on and I am unsure what to do next :(Such a shamed and really disappointing.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 5 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Imballaggio e spedizioni perfetti. Li sto usando da qualche giorno semplicemente fantastico. Avevo il visore per Ps4 e sono stato fatti passi in avanti in termini di praticità e qualità. Il futuro è questo. Consigliato.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 31 October 2019

one_reviews_text: Alors, pour une immersion totale dans un jeu, il n'y a rien de mieux. Vous perdez toutes notions du temps et d'espace et êtes vraiment acteur du jeu (Half-Life Alyx ou Simulations voitures).La résolution est bonne sans être du 4K. Il faut un peu chercher pour pouvoir l'optimiser convenablement.!!! RALLONGES ACTIVES !!!Par contre, pour ceux qui veulent une rallonge, il ne faut pas uniquement prendre la rallonge DP que Amazon propose mais aussi une rallonge USB 3.0. Et pour cela, étant donné les 5 mètres de câble d'origne du casque, elle doit IMPERATIVEMENT être active car l'USB 3.0 n'a qu'une portée de 5 m.Perso j'ai mis deux rallonges (DP et USB) ACTIVES de 5 mètres (ce qui m'en fait 10 car je joue loin de mon pc) et ça fonctionne parfaitement.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 3 February 2021

one_reviews_text: As the only vr headset I have used I can not compare quality and experience with other headsets, but compared to the Other available headsets in Australia value for money for this is great and I was not waiting to see if we ever get a valve index in Australia and not to meantion I foresee the price being at the high end. The rift s is fun and immersive and I am impressed with the feel, comfort, optics and clarity, I see a lot of people on the net complaining about the audio but I can say it’s a non issue for me or the immersion.Shipping was good.Highly recommend if you are keen to try a good quality mainstream be headset
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 22 June 2019
review_title: Great value and introduction. Love it.

one_reviews_text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!It won't even work half the time.. If it's not the black screen it's the 3 dots loading screen and if you finally get your game to work; its not long before the mic cuts out and no one can hear you.I am forever un-plugging it and plugging it back in and sometimes that wont even fix it!Would 100% recommend to save your money and buy a different product.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 10 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Il biglietto d'ingresso per la realta' virtuale,ottimo rapporto qualita' prezzo, funziona bene ed e' un altro modo di giocare.Richiede un account Facebook?E chi non ne ha uno?
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 22 January 2021

one_reviews_text: You get one star per month I a was able to use it.... Lots of fun, amazing product... for one month and a half. After this it suddenly stopped working, black screen with loud static noise after plugging it in. unable to bootup. Forget customer service. no number to call, emails take forever to respond to.... It stopped working one week after the one month return window expired.... go figure
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 12 February 2021
review_title: Unreliable product. Crashing, black screen, static noise

one_reviews_text: Relación calidad precio insuperable. La calidad de imagen del visor es muy buena y se siente muy cómodo en largas sesiones de uso. El único 'pero' es que la regulación IPD es por software. Aún así, totalmente recomendable.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 14 January 2021

one_reviews_text: I never got to actually try the Rift S because the headset has a display port which is completely incompatible with my laptop. ***There are no adaptors you can purchase that make it compatible either. My only option was to buy a gaming laptop or a MacBook.  Back it goes.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 30 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Produkt vorbestellt zu günstigeren Preis. Schnelle Lieferung. Mobilität hier super. Inside Outside Tracking ist sehr schön. Rundum neu hergestellt. Alles top.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 6 July 2019

one_reviews_text: I actually love this item. I can meditate, exercise, video game & watch movies,...The only thing I dislike is the controllers which are very hungry and I have to replace the battery more often....
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 31 July 2020
review_title: Technology from future! a-must-have gadget for tech. lovers.

one_reviews_text: Ottimo prodotto, libero da quasi tutti i vincoli, qualità migliorata rispetto si predecessori, leggerissimo!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 18 September 2020

one_reviews_text: I Bought this to see what VR was all about because it was A: Actually available in Australia, and B: Was a reasonable price. It has exceeded my expectations.I use it a lot for flying in DCS and using a head tracker just doesn't compare. Doing loops is actually scary. For the first few flights it was genuinely triggering my fear of heights.These things are the future.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 24 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Veramente un bel giocattolino, attualmente a questo prezzo con questa qualità non c'è nulla di paragonabile, ovviamente più è potente il pc meglio sarà la resa.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 14 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Insane value for money, if your thinking of getting this for your first vr, its a fantastic choice ive never had an issue with gameplay on games my pc was powerful enough to run. Pro tip if your headset cable can work around your entire vr area disable all audio in your rift s so that you dojt have to disconnect it ever it makes switching between vr and normal seemless, was a pain in the rear trying to get everything to swap to the rift audio and back again id end up having to restart my pc, but the vr itself is extremely worth the money.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 13 November 2019
review_title: disable rift audio drivers for seemless switching.

one_reviews_text: I bought this, I was very excited to use it. When I first got it, it was very fun, however, it only lasted a bit the controller's lot calibration, I fixed it, then I moved things around for more space then it wouldn't calibrate the floor so I returned it.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 10 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Worked for 2 months and had USB or/and sensor calibrating issues. Returned to oculus 3 months ago and still no replacement sent out yet. Facebook/oculus granted a replacement but they always find an excuse to delay the shipment. Finally, it seems they shipped a replacement. The shipping label says: REFURBISHED - Oculus Rift S headset (Grade B) ??? What ???
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 3 May 2021
review_title: Worked for 2 months and 3 months after returning I am still waiting for a replacement

one_reviews_text: Es el mejor visor calidad/precio que puedes adquirir. Te llevas el mejor tracking inside out del mercado, poder jugar de forma nativa a los exclusivos de oculus, y el FOV, que aunque es de los más pequeños tampoco hay tanta diferencia con los demás.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 27 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Its a 5 stars for me. It's my first experience as a VR user and I'm enjoying it. I've already tried HTC vive so what I could tell: The controllers are a better fit. And the helmet is lighter, which is good for a long period of gaming. Totally recommend it
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 August 2019

one_reviews_text: be really carefull to get your ipd checked before buying it , its a good piece of hardware but i cant use it because my ipd is 56 and the minimum ipd is 59.5 and there is no manual setting for the lenses ., i cannot use it miself so i gave it to my wifeeverything is a blur for me but works great for my wife with an ipd of 65
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 7 December 2019

one_reviews_text: As an owner of Rift 1 I wanted upgraded experience. But i didnt do my research. And never measured my IPD. Now I did and i cant use Rift S with my 72mm IPD. I was struggling for 3 days but in the end decided to return it. Do your research and measure you IPD before buying. I dont know how did they decided that fixing lenses at 64 mm would be great idea.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 26 February 2020
review_title: Good product which may not work for your eyes

one_reviews_text: Visori ottimi per chi vuole un prodotto molto buono senza spendere più del computer stesso, non richiedono i sensori e sono provvisiti di 2 joystick
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 6 May 2020
review_title: Ottimo prodotto per avere una buona esperienza

one_reviews_text: The Oculus Rift S is great! It's very easy to configure and the end result is very convincing. The experience in VR games is very immersive and you don't need to install wall cameras for room scale support. The headset has cameras that handle this itself.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 4 March 2020

one_reviews_text: فكرة جميلة ولاكن يسبب الدوار يفضل تجربتة قبل الشراء
review_date: Reviewed in Saudi Arabia on 17 February 2021

one_reviews_text: El headset lo he disfrutado, sin embargo deja mucho que desear pues Oculus lo ha descuidado completamente. Desde que lo compre ha sido un dolor de cabeza utilizarlo pues ya que una actualización de Firmware ha complicado la manera de conectarlo desde hace rato. En lo personal si quieren evitar problemas, no compren este Headset y vayan directo por un Quest 2.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 2 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Ottimo, per un primo avvicinamento alla VR, per il momento, dopo ore di prove non ho riscontrato nessun sintomo di nausea ecc......consigliato se non si possiede già i modelli precedenti
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 24 July 2019

one_reviews_text: whilst the item really is a great purchase the set up i found was impossible for my Teenage Sonconstant plug this and unplug that then the computer found the Rift then not, constantly reconnectingonce it was set up and working it worked great but alittle more needed than plug and play which iswhat we were lead to believe.Five StarsMark
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 26 December 2020

one_reviews_text: Antes de comprar hay que revisar muy bien los requisitos y especificaciones, tener puertos usb 3.0, puerto display port, etc.Una vez que tienes el software de oculus solo tienes que conectarlo, hacer un pequeño setup y a jugar, muy fácil y nada complicado.Pros: sencillo, cómodo, y fácil de usar, uno de los mejores en el mercado en cuanto a calidad de imagen.Cons: la pantalla del visor va a 80hz, si estabas acostumbrado a jugar a 144hz, la diferencia es algo notoria.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 4 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Siamo ancora lontani da una grafica accettabile... ma su alcuni giochi ( non di corse) risulta essere appagante
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 29 July 2019
review_title: Ci siamo quasi .. ma non del tutto

one_reviews_text: Had PSVR in the past but this is far better than. Fits very well in the head and the fact of being connected with a cable to the pc prevents us to have a dangerous battery just in front of our eyes, like those called "stand alone" headsets like quest 2 also from the same company.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 7 March 2021

one_reviews_text: Provatelo e rimarrete a bocca aperta! Soprattutto, per uno come me che lo usa su Flight Simulator 2020
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 26 January 2021

one_reviews_text: J'ai bien aimer le casque rien de negatif a dire dessus.MAISLes extension sur le marcher ne son pas a recommender. J'ai rencontrer trop de probleme et souvent etait causer par le display port non detecter
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 15 February 2021

one_reviews_text: This is the best VR period. No sensors and provides highest quality on a vr headset. Would recommend this over the quest
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 2 September 2021

one_reviews_text: Ottimo visore per la VR, in offerta a 349 euro è un vero affare. Installazione facile e veloce. Ottimo anche il packaging che all'occorrenza può essere utilizzato senza problemi per trasportare il visore.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 27 March 2021

one_reviews_text: Have been using it for two weeks and it works as intended. Invested in some rechargeable batteries to replace the 2 AA batteries that came with the package and it has been playing games well, would recommend the VR experience!
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 20 December 2019

one_reviews_text: c'est un tres bon casque, il n'y a pas a douter : l'immersion est totale, on en vient a préférer ce monde virtuel au monde réel.mais alors, pourquoi une seule étoile ?et bien tout le mérite revient au service amazon !on commande, on paie, on est encaissé et puis "votre commande est prete". chouette !"votre commande va etre livrée lundi" : cooooool !et puis plus rien, pas un seul scan du colis par qui que ce soit pendant déjà une semaine.autant dire que ca sentait l'employé indélicat qui se serait mis le colis dans la poche...bref, procédure de remboursement et achat du casque chez un concurrent, au même prix, chez Boulanger, pour dire les choses.et du coup, j'ai été très ému de me retrouver tout entier dans nova prospekt, ca fait tout drole de se retrouver face à des entité "grandeur nature" que je n'avais cotoyé que par écran interposé.Ah ! la seule étoile de cette évaluation est entièrement dédiée au service client, sans doute basé au maroc, le seul point positif de toute cette histoire et pour le reste, je vais m'éloigner gentiment de ce vendeur sur lequel on ne peut pas vraiment compter.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 4 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Pretty damn good, Great deal for what you get, the only issue is that it doesn't have a removable cushion so has the potential to get really gross after a while.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 20 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Excelente visor, si tienes laptop nesecitas que tu lap tenga salida de display port, si no tiene con un adaptador de tipo c a display port siempre y cuando tu tarjeta grafica tenga la salida directa en mi caso funciono con una lap ROG
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 7 April 2020
review_title: Verifica la salida antes de comprar

one_reviews_text: Déçus de mon achat.Un cadeau de Noël qui n'a jamais fonctionné, malgré un échange impossible de le connecter. Nous avons été jusqu'à changer la carte vidéo de l'ordinateur pour être sur d'avoir fait tous ce qui été prévu par les indications d'installation. Éteint et redémarrez l'installation à plusieurs reprise, impossible de le connecter.Obligé de retourner l'article.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 8 January 2021
review_title: Jamais réussi à connecter, déçu de mon achat !!!

one_reviews_text: Der Sound,nicht besonders,aber man kann sich ja passende Kopfhöhrer zulegen,sonst sehr gut bin voll zufrieden,auch mit Steam passt alles.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 7 October 2020

one_reviews_text: He comprado este producto y llevo ya casi 1 mes con él y he de decir que es bastante bueno.Si utilizas gafas, puedes usarlo sin problema aunque al principio molestaran (sobretodo si son montura de pasta).
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 3 January 2021

one_reviews_text: This is my first VR gaming headset and I absolutely love it. I have been wanting to get into VR for a while but the prices were too steep at the time. I'm glad a big name company could manage something more affordable. I've read and seen reviews about constant errors that makes games unplayable but have no had those experiences. There are minor issue like crossing the controllers over but that was well within my expectations.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 8 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Le casque en lui même est très bien, le gros problème est arrivé en Octobre 2020 avec l'obligation d'avoir un compte facebook pour continuer à utiliser le casque. conclusion : casque "en panne" puisque je refuse catégoriquement de créer un compte FB et par conséquent de valider les dernières CGU
review_date: Reviewed in France on 29 November 2020

one_reviews_text: Overall, offers a better experience, having upgraded from the Rift CV1.Tracking is decent enough to justify not having to set up the external towers of the CV1.Image quality is vastly improved over the CV1, with a very noticeable improvement to screen-door effect and god-rays.The headset is also more comfortable than the CV1, and is very similar to the PSVR setup.I don't see this as a side-grade to the CV1, but as a genuine upgrade that was worth the purchase.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 18 November 2019
review_title: Better than a side-grade from Rift CV1

one_reviews_text: Awesome gear! I just wish that you could change over/refresh the foam bits on the headset - my kids are sweating up a storm with these on and it won't take long before they smell and start degrading. Perhaps a velcro type system with replacement foam pads of different sizes??  I would definitely purchase foam pads separately if it meant a great, hygienic fit. But apart from that, these are great!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 19 January 2020
review_title: Awesome addition to gaming set up.

one_reviews_text: Excellent casque dont je suis pleinement satisfait aujourd'hui mais qui n'a pas été le cas lorsque je l'ai reçu.En effet il ne voulait pas reconnaitre les ports USB 3.0 de ma carte mère, les considérants comme des ports USB 2.0.Il m'a donc fallu acheter une carte PCI Express 4x avec un port USB 3.1 type A et un port USB 3.1 type C dont je n'ai pas l'utilité actuellement.Sinon, ce n'est que du bonheur que de naviguer maintenant en réalité virtuelle avec ce casque.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 30 July 2020
review_title: Attention aux problèmes de compatibilité avec l'USB 3.0

one_reviews_text: Dans les plus :-Rapport qualité/prix imbattable-Casque très confortable-Manettes très pratiques-Mise en service très simple d'utilisation.Dans les défauts :-Pas possibilité de régler la distance inter-pupilles, ce qui peut être très gênant voire empêcher certaines personnes d'utiliser le casque. Il y a un réglage logiciel mais il est complètement inutile malheureusement...-Mousses qui se salissent vite à cause de la transpiration et qui sont quasiment impossible à nettoyer ( heureusement, il existe des kits pour changer ces parties là, mais c'est encore 50€ à débourser...)-Depuis peu, il faut OBLIGATOIREMENT lier son compte Facebook pour pouvoir utiliser le casque si on a pas déjà un compte Oculus.Malgré tout, c'est pour l'instant le seul casque VR à un prix aussi abordable tout en proposant une aussi bonne immersion. Je ne peux donc que le conseiller si le fait de lier votre compte facebook ne vous gêne pas.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 4 September 2020
review_title: Très bon rapport qualité/prix, mais obligation de lier à un compte Facebook depuis peu...

one_reviews_text: Great product. A brilliant headset for an first personal VR headset. Easy to set up- mostly just plug and play with a few minor pc settings adjustments. Some PCs will require more adjusting than others though.  Great functioning as far as display quality and in game experience. Capable of some very immersive experiences! As my first personal headset, I am very satisfied. Price is great value for the quality for PCVR.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 6 March 2020
review_title: Great choice for a first  VR headset at a good price.

one_reviews_text: My first unit was defective. Really need better QC on this. My second unit was functional however, setting it up still had lots of issues. In total ive spent around 15 hours getting this headset  to work. Now once i did get it to work it was an awesome expereince. Headset had little screen door compared to other headsets, and the controllers feel pretty nice in the hand.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 23 October 2019
review_title: Ton of issues, but once it works its pretty cool

one_reviews_text: An sich ein gutes VR Headset doch die Controller verlieren bei Vibration und zu schnellen Bewegungen das tracking. Daher für shooter unbrauchbar und für Beatsaber ist bei expert Ende.MoBo: Aorus B450CPU: Ryzen 2700 4.45GhzRam: 16GB CL16 3000MhzGPU: GTX 970 4Gb Vram
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 5 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Non giochi, tu sei dentro al videogioco. E' già detto tutto. L'ho comperato per giocare subito ad Alien Isolation, e che dire sei dentro, quindi delle emozioni pazzesche. Poi non parliamo di Alyx. Non vi pentirete. Garantito.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 14 September 2020
review_title: Fantastico il migliore acquisto di sempre per chi ama i videogiochi

one_reviews_text: + Good Value for the price+ Its good enough to use and enjoy the games- VR needs better resolution in general- I can get sweaty a lot playing Beat Saber and other games- Cables- Motion sickness and movement in general (probably unsolvable with current technology)Overall I like my Oculus Rift S
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 26 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Je suis tres satisfaite de ma VR, je l'utilise presque chaque jour. L'imersion est incroyable.J'ai du retourner le tout pour faire remplacer une manette droite defectueuse. Le remplacement s'est fait rapidement et je suis tres heureuse de mon achat!
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 26 June 2019
review_title: Tres satisfaite de ma vr, je vous le recommande

one_reviews_text: Geniales, mucho mejor que las de ps4, las use mucho en el confinamiento.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 19 July 2020

one_reviews_text: Tout content de le recevoir, ayant eu énormément de mal a l'avoir.Qualité d'image superbe, ca change du Rift.Mais !!!!!!!!!Malheureusement, j'ais du le renvoyer, car injouable dans tous mes jeux Vr.Ca rame sérère !!!!!!! quoi que je fasse.Soit je suis tombé sur un modèle défectueux, sois je n'ais pas la configuration nécessaire.Pourtant j'ais bien vérifier avant et je suis bon.Autrement bonne qualité de fabrication, et surtout confortable.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 18 September 2020
review_title: Content de le recevoir, mais renvoyé

one_reviews_text: I had 1 hour to play tonight. They made me wait for 15 minutes to install all the obligatory updates and after that games stopped working. I just love modern technology.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 14 December 2019

one_reviews_text: The oculus rift s is great. I think for anyone that can’t afford or can’t purchase a valve index that this is the next best option for about a third of the cost. The only downsides are that the controllers run out of battery way too fast which can be fixed by buying rechargeable batteries. The other downside is that you have to restart the software almost every time you want to use the oculus rift s. Overall very positive experience would recommend to anyone.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 8 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Facile da usare, comodo e divertente. Bisogna sbattersi un pò per installarlo ma una volta fatto è tutto in discesa
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 11 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Je trouve ce casque vr tres bien. Je n ai eu aucun probleme avec. La seul chose que je trouve dommage cest que si on lausse pluguer le usb. Le casque et les manettes tombent en veille et cela a mis mes batteries de manette a plat en pas long. Pour le reste toute est super.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 2 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Ständig muss das "Spielfeld" bestätigt werden, während einer der updates die einem auch einfach aufgezwungen werden, brannte der cursor eines controllers ein. Absoluter Mist. Oculus ist ein no-go. Da gibt es sicherlich bessere. Für mich aufjedenfall das letzte Oculus Produkt!
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 24 June 2021

one_reviews_text: I absolutely love my headset. By far the best bang for your buck VR. Extremely comfortable and easy to set up and use. The ability to take it anywhere is absolutely fantastic because of its built in sensors. Paired with my Gaming Laptop I can literally VR anywhere I want
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 12 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Pluses - very fast delivery, product fully meet my expectations, work perfectly. Minuses - looks like my package was opened somewhere, it can be at customs. Also my payment was accepted, then rejected, then rejected, and only then accepted (I have no idea what happened, but finally everything is ok).Really good item.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 23 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Ottimi per il gaming ad immersione nella realtà virtuale. Sensazioni meravigliose.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 24 October 2020

one_reviews_text: J'ai craqué, je voulais un casque VR, j'ai longuement hésité et j'ai pris le rift S. Son prix était bien plus attractif que les concurrents et je ne suis pas déçus.En comparaison avec le Vive celui ci paraît un peu plus léger (je n'en ai pas la certitude) et surtout sans capteur de présence à devoir poser, c'est super pratique !L'installation se fait en 2s (a condition d'avoir installer le soft oculus au prealable si on a une connexion ADSL). La qualité du casque est super et pas désagréable a porter.Par contre ça bloque du côté des controlleurs qui ne sont pas très pratique, j'ai ajouté une coque dessus et ça change complètement la prise en main (je vous conseille des coque pour controlleur trouvable sur Amazon). Et les piles ... L'obligation d'utiliser des piles pour des controlleurs en 2021, c'est un peu dommage. Mais bon, 2 piles (une pile par contrôleurs) rechargeables et le tour est joué.Si vous avez un petit /moyen budget et que vous voulez absolument faire de la VR, ce casque est fait pour vous, malgré ses petits défauts il reste un excellent casque.PS : j'ai suivi le conseil d'un commentaire et j'ai joué a Beat Saber. Depuis je ne passe plus les portes avec mes bras.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 30 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Producto de calidad, y recomendadisimo. Lo malo que a mi me da un fallo y siempre debo desconectarlas y conectarlas de nuevo para que me funcionen correctamente. Por lo demas es increible.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 14 December 2019

one_reviews_text: The Oculus Rift S for the few hours I have used so far, has been an immersive, wonderful experience. The quality is great, the setup is easy and I haven't had any issues so far. Well worth the price that is offered. Just the first contact short game offered got me super excited and feeling joyful from what I was experiencing and I can't wait to keep using it for a long time to come.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 6 March 2020
review_title: Superb product with great VR quality

one_reviews_text: First Time VR user. Did my research and decided on Oculus Rift S. All the reviews said this was best quality for the price. They weren't wrong. This is an excellent headset. No problems with setup; was so easy. Tonnes of games available and easy to purchase, automatically installs them as well. Quality of optics is very high; at least for me as a first timer. I know there are more expensive, better quality systems out there, but this one is fantastic and highly recommended.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 26 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Un ottimo visore per il prezzo.Consiglio di comprare delle pile ricaricabili per il due controller perché so scaricano molto velocemente 1/2 giorno di sessioni lunghe, e ritrovarsi senza pile è molto fastidioso
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 15 April 2021

one_reviews_text: Prodotto ottimo ma dopo pochi giorni trovato a 100 euro meno, ho richiesto il rimborso della differenza, ma non mi hanno considerato.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 13 December 2020

one_reviews_text: As a long-time VR user (I've had VR since the Oculus Rift Kickstarter days), this is a REALLY great device!  The tracking is absolutely flawless, and the clarity is beyond great.  I can't say enough good things about it!
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 24 May 2019

one_reviews_text: This is my first Vr experience so far and this is a very nice gaming experienceThe Vr headset is beautyfull , confortable and its easy to useThe price is really cheap for a vr with that quality , im totally satisfiedI looked a lot of review on all vr and i choosed the Oculus Rifts SI recommend the Oculus Rifts S  to everyone !
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 23 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Good headset, But it is owned by Facebook and you must log in with your Facebook account. But if you post anything that goes against Facebook Community Satndards (what ever that is) they will lock you out of you Oculus account also. I will never Buy another Oculus Product.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 21 October 2021
review_title: If you upset Facebook they will lock you  out of your Oculus Account

one_reviews_text: Pese a ser alguien acostumbrado a lo "electrónico" nunca había probado las RV. Solo puedo decir que es increíble y que no hay palabras para describir la experiencia, tienes que probarlo.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 1 January 2020

one_reviews_text: The device was well protected for shipping.  As well because the temperature was below freezing I was notified of delivery time so it wouldn’t sit outside.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 1 February 2021
review_title: Great VR device, make sure you have the horsepower on your computer to run it

one_reviews_text: I've been in the market for a good, mid-range VR headset and this is perfect. It runs well even with my mid-range pc and has no problems tracking. It has done well in the 3 weeks I've had it so far. the only thing I can say is to buy rechargeable AA batteries for it as it usually uses them up every few days in the controllers and make sure you have a big, well-airconditioned space to play in.Thanks Oculous!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 12 March 2020

one_reviews_text: Selbst mit einer relativ günstigen Grafikkarte wie der GTX 1060 funktioniert sie einwandfrei.Auch beim Tracking waren nie Probleme aufgetreten.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 22 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Quitando algún pequeño detalle sin mucha importancia este aparato es indispensable para los que les guste jugar. Una pasada
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 23 June 2019
review_title: Un nuevo mundo para jugar y experimentar cosas nuevas

one_reviews_text: Ich finde das Teil super, ich fahre damit Rennsimulation der PC benötigt dafür aber High-End Komponenten da Simulation doch sehr anspruchsvolle sind. Habe aber auch schon einen Shooter aus dem Oculus Store angespielt, mach echt Laune und entführt einem in eine neue Gaming Welt.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 12 January 2020

one_reviews_text: Un oggetto di ultima generazione. Per chi vuole sperimentare nuove dimensioni tecnologiche.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 10 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Prodotto di qualità ad un prezzo giusto,mi sono affrettato a comprarlo durante i saldi e non vedevo l'ora di provare l'immersione che offre il visore....se non si prova è difficile descrivere l'impatto che si ha durante i giochi VR
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 17 January 2021

one_reviews_text: Die VR Brille hat mich positiv überrascht. Sie braucht keine störenden Sensoren mehr und hat ein schärferes Bild als die alte Rift!
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 11 June 2019

one_reviews_text: My husband loves it the only issue we had is it needs a display port. He was using an Asus gaming laptop that didn't have that port. He had to buy a new computer to be able to use my gift. He didn't want to return it cause he really likes this VR console. Overall, good quality. I tried it once and the graphics are good.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 23 December 2020
review_title: Good quality but needs a display port

one_reviews_text: VR was so much fun but four months in the cameras just decided to stop working oculus support has been ok not the best as I was hoping to just get a repair or replacement but instead I have to try and repair the vr myself just with guides from oculus right now can't recommend it not until Oculus fix these random errors.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 12 April 2021

one_reviews_text: È divertentissimo e ti permette di vivere il gioco in maniera speciale.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 4 February 2020

one_reviews_text: En general cumple y la única queja que tendría sería que se queda algo corto de fov, me hubiera gustado algo más y el IPD no he tenido problemas.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 25 June 2019

one_reviews_text: Juegos caros y demasiadas plataformas exclusivas con los juegos buenos.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 15 August 2021

one_reviews_text: I'm new to vr and theOculus rift s was as expected. It arrived 3 days early and was ready to use out of the box. The resolution makes it very immersive. Only cons are the wires and the speakers not being the best, meaning you need to wear a gaming headset over the quite comfortable halo headstrap. Overall, great product
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 30 January 2021
review_title: Great for people new to vr

one_reviews_text: It works very well. The fact that the system has built in sensors is very handy in my opinion, and I was able to start playing very soon after downloading the software.In the 25 hours I've already clocked in VR with this system, I've had one instance of the controllers not tracking properly. However after simply restarting the Oculus, it started working as normal again
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 9 December 2019

one_reviews_text: Very happy with my purchase, the quality of this VR headset and performance one word Amazing. For the price, I don't think there is anything better at the moment.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 15 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Headset camera kept bugging our and couldn't figure out what the area out, play area would be deleted when ever the headseat crashed, controllers would glitch and not detects hits, if headset played expert level beat saber games or anything with high renders would crash and lag out the headset
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 11 October 2020
review_title: Many problems and extremely hard to find pros

one_reviews_text: Etant mon premier casque VR, c'est dur de faire une comparaison. Mais du pur plaisir! Le system Gardian avec caméra intégré est très intéressant, il nous permet de démarqué le territoire de jeux dans la pièce. A date j'adore.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 31 July 2020

one_reviews_text: Ottimo prodotto. Esperienza immersiva da provare. La risoluzione non è ancora al top ma non è colpa del prodotto
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 28 April 2020

one_reviews_text: Works great, absolutely happy with this buy, my 1st VR.I also had reason to deal with oculus's customer service and even though the hardware issue was my fault they were super accommodating in providing me a replacement, it's rare to have a company that realises a happy customer is a return customer that will tell others and generate more business. good job
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 5 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Broke after a few uses. Looked online to see that lots of them split at the same part. Very cheap, not made to last and the company Oculus do not want to know. Steer well clear or be disappointed!!!!! Definitely NOT worth the money. Be warned 😀
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 14 November 2021

one_reviews_text: En bref:Très bien, à peine quelques points négatifs indépendants du matériel (comme la bibliothèque exclusive d'Oculus) mais au bout d'un mois d'utilisation je suis ravi. Installation en dix minutes et ensuite c'est bluffant ! Je joue sur un espace de 2x2m et c'est parfait.Si votre pc n'est pas accessible facilement, pensez à acheter des petites rallonges d'1 ou 2m comme ça vous pouvez débrancher le casque sans galère.En détail :Le Rift S est mon premier casque, je l'ai choisi car plus simple à configurer que le Vive et ses deux stations externes, et aussi plus abordable. Rien à redire sur la détection et le tracking des manettes, le système intégré de délimitation de l'espace de jeu est également efficace. Je trouve l'autonomie des manettes très correcte. Le casque est assez confortable et je n'ai pas trop de problèmes de buée. Les haut-parleurs intégrés dans l'arceau font très bien le travail mais il y a un jack intégré si vous préférez mettre des écouteurs.La bibliothèque Oculus est bien fournie en expériences et jeux mais attention elle est exclusive à l'heure actuelle, donc seulement utilisable avec les casques de la marque. Vous pouvez également utiliser Steam selon votre préférence (cette plateforme à l'avantage d'être ouverte donc vous pourrez toujours jouer à vos jeux si vous passez sur une autre marque comme Vive).L'immersion est incroyable dès qu'on enfile le casque. On passe vraiment dans un autre monde le cerveau est leurré !Moi qui suis très sensible à la lumière bleue, je n'ai pas à me plaindre de fatigue visuelle. J'ai essayé avec mes lunettes (qui ne sont pas correctrices) et ça rentre dans le casque, cependant c'est plus confort sans. Pour des activités calmes, tout va bien, mais si il fait chaud et/ou si vous jouez à des jeux debout où il faut s'agiter, vous allez vite suer. Des jeux comme Beat Saber vous font travailler votre cardio et brûler des calories !Certains jeux peuvent donner le "mal des transports", notamment si votre pc n'est pas assez puissant donc vérifiez bien la comptabilité du pc. Le site Oculus a un petit logiciel qui regarde ça pour vous.A voir la durée dans le temps des parties en mousse au contact avec la peau car un peu d'inquiétude que ça finisse par s'abimer ou sentir mauvais, ceci dit je ne vois pas particulièrement de commentaires à ce sujet donc ça doit aller et il existe aussi les petits masques à mettre entre le visage et le casque, je pense vite indispensables si vous jouer à plusieurs.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 1 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Las gafas tienen una calidad visual tremenda, me va de maravilla con mi gtx 1080, la inmersión en los juegos de VR es increíble. Será mil veces mejor cuando le metan finger tracking a las gafas.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 7 March 2020

one_reviews_text: non mi e' piaciuto niente si vede male anzi malissimo .una fregata
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 14 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Con l'uscita del LINK il rift non ha più molto senso,.... meglio acquistare un QUEST. Purtroppo la notizia è uscita in questi giorni e ormai non posso più cambiare il prodotto.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 28 September 2019

one_reviews_text: Credo che questo Oculus Rift S sia stato utilizzato da qualche essere non naturale credo... Cioè.. è pieno di graffi morsi cose del genere😅300 euro non ne valgono la pensa usati...
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 22 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Ho acquistato il rift s e devo dire che il prodotto in se é ottimo, unica cosa per farlo andare al massimo delle sue potenzialità occorre un computer molto potente, soddisfatto dell'acquisto.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 9 October 2020

one_reviews_text: For the great quality of the product at this price compare to the index.  Definitely this is much better.  Only negative is that the cord tangles too much. Not enough vr high quality titles.  But expecting that to improve in future.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 25 July 2019
review_title: Great buy for the price compare to competition.

one_reviews_text: Leider muss ich jedes mal wenn ich die Rift S starte den Spielbereich neu einstellen. Manchmal verliert die VR Brille das auch mitten im Spiel.Bei Ocolus stehen nicht die Spiele im Vordergrund sondern das Produkt.Dieses wird übermäßig in den Vordergrund gerückt.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 28 March 2020

one_reviews_text: Seamless integration with an i9 & rtx 2080. set up is easy to achieve:Beautiful visuals and flawless motion @ max fps / refresh.Downside: pick up some rechargeable batteries for the hand controllers, it reminded me of the first digital cameras, and how batteries only lasted a few days.Awesome Purchase, if you have a gaming setup.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 12 September 2019

one_reviews_text: PROSAccurate motion tracking for both headset and controllers.Full software library.Easy to set up.Includes touch controllers.CONSDisplayPort-only; no HDMI.Still uses a physical cable to connect to a PC.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 24 January 2020
review_title: The Oculus Rift S sports a smart, comfy design and a gorgeous display.

one_reviews_text: Attention ! Mon PC portable etant éligible à la VR et recent, (acheté 1400 euro pour cela il y a 4 mois), ne suffit pas a faire fonctionner le casque en raison semblerait il, d'une alimentation pas assez puissante (il se coupe au bout de 3 secondes d utilisation). Un grand bravo au constructeur.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 8 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Arrived quicker than expected, in perfect condition, really good for its price and since this was my first VR headset its blown my expectations out of the water, fits well even when I'm wearing my glasses plus the built in speakers are good sound quality.Only gave it a 4 star because it has issues connecting sometimes buts it's an easy fix :)
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 7 September 2020

one_reviews_text: Excellent VR experience for the money! Just one thing was annoying, it kept disconnecting from the computer, software saying it couldn’t find the headset, well if it happens to you just buy a powered USB 3 hub, that solves that issue for good.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 27 February 2021

one_reviews_text: Really freaking cool. My eyes get tired after about 4-5 hours of use. Immensely immersive and the controllers are very well designed. Not to mention that it doesn't need sensors around the play area and tracks it on the headset itself. The only downside is this intermittent flickering of black and white static. Pretty sure this is a software issue because it's not happening as often now.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 4 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Esperienza unica, soprattutto oer quanto riguarda il mondo della simulazione. Ha ancora dei difetti, soprattutto dal punto di vista della risoluzione e andrebbe miglioratoil design per quanto riguarda la comodità che è sufficiente ma non eccezionale.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 25 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Como actualización de las anterior Rift cv1 está genial. Gran ganacia en nitidez y más simple en instalación.Algunos puntos débiles pero no son importantes para mí.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 20 July 2019
review_title: Buena actualización de las anterior Rift cv1

one_reviews_text: È il mio primo visore fantastico non credevo fosse così immersivo
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 4 February 2020

one_reviews_text: Excellent casque, je vous le conseille si vous avez la config PC qui va avec.Le rendu visuel des jeux est bien au dessus par rapport à l'Occulus Quest.Le seul défaut c'est le son, je vous conseille de rajouter un casque audio ou des écouteurs à la prise jack du casque pour avoir une meilleure immersion.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 13 June 2019
review_title: Très bon casque mais le son pas top

one_reviews_text: I bought this for my daughter. After purchasing it, we learned of a defect on them that renders the sound useless, but not ALL of them have the issue. Sure enough, ours did. I wish companies would recall products that are defective instead of continuing to sell them.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 27 August 2021

one_reviews_text: good value for money package. inside out tracking works well.. good software ecosystem. controller tracking is very good. games like beat saber and space pirate trainer are awesome.  mainly use for DCS world flight sim... works well...  improvement over Rift CV1. good stepping stone VR headset until better graphics API's, cheaper top end hardware and better VR systems arrive
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 19 August 2019

one_reviews_text: Whenever I move too fast, or I put my hands too low or slightly too backwards, I just lose the tracking. Bought this to play beat saber since I broke my old oculus, and now I regret not putting a few more bucks to get a vive.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 2 September 2019
review_title: Tracking sucks, better get a vive

one_reviews_text: Esperienza immersiva eccezionale. Lo indossi e sembra di entrare in un altra dimensione, se non fosse per il peso veramente eccessivo e una nitidezza delle immagini non proprio ottima.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 26 December 2020

one_reviews_text: Had to send back as connectors were not clearly explained. Ended up not being compatible with my brand new gaming pc.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 31 January 2021

one_reviews_text: i love the fact i don't need trackers around my room and that such a device can bring a new experience to your life and take you away to anywhere you want. The tracking is good yes, there are moments how ever when tracking is lost but thats a given since all the cameras that do track are on the front of the head piece  so just a heads up if your hands are at your side or behind your back it won't track so keep that in mind, over all fantastic VR headset it's a 10.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 30 June 2019
review_title: plug and play, easy to use, good tracking, hell of a experience.

one_reviews_text: Amazing headset with almost no complaints, The only thing is, I've had 3 of these things, all with different defects, including static audio with a defective microphone, Joysticks getting stuck in the up/down position etc
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 10 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Très bon casque VR ! Le tracking est plus que correct ! Néanmoins, sur certains jeux tels que Beat Saber par exemple, le tracking peut de temps à autre avoir un peu de mal à traquer vos mouvements si vous passez la main derrière votre dos par exemple. Pour ceux qui auraient quelques freeze et qui jouent sur Steam, essayez de lancer vos jeux sans SteamVR mais en passant par une invite de commande Occulus.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 29 November 2020
review_title: Très bon casque VR mais quelques problèmes néanmoins

one_reviews_text: Not sure yet as it could not be connected to the computer. Now I have to buy a new desktop to use it as it has a digital port cable which only works on some devices There wasn't enough info on front pages of the product. You have to go searching to see what the connection is. Specially if you are not computer savvy.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 28 December 2019

one_reviews_text: The headset is nice and fits my face well. The controls are easy to get used to and the store has plenty of free apps to get you startedI live in Australia so in summer I would recommend playing this with the Aircon on max, can get a bit sweaty under the headset.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 30 December 2020
review_title: Great VR without the huge price tag

one_reviews_text: Very good headset, haven't had any issues with it other than the fact its own by Facebook and the software is sometimes a problem to deal with. There are for sure better headsets out there but this one is fine.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 31 December 2020

one_reviews_text: Using this for over 20 games has been fun and enjoying. Performs very well with high quality. There are some issues with controllers using battery whenever I'm not playing, but that can be fixed by just closing the oculus software.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 16 October 2020

one_reviews_text: Il Rift s é un ottimo visore se siete curiosi di  provare la realtà virtuale.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 4 December 2019
review_title: Se volete cimentarvi nel mondo Vr non c'è nulla di meglio per il prezzo che si paga

one_reviews_text: Première semaine avec l'occulus était très impressiant.Malheureusement, l'appareil est beaucoup trop instable. Au moins update de carte video ou de windows, je dois me battre avec l'appareil pour qu'il refonctionne a nouveau. Le cable de l'appereil est égallement précaire le malheure de l'accrocher en utilisation coupe le display. Non recommander si vous n'êtes pas un tech gourou.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 14 October 2019

one_reviews_text: Il software è troppo fragile, quasi as ogni utilizzo da problemi di riconoscimento o crash. Inoltre sono molto deluso dalla grafica ed immersività, ma forse ero io ad immaginarmelo troppo performante
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 14 July 2019

one_reviews_text: Spedizione velocissima. Tutto perfetto. Ottimo prodotto lo consiglio
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 18 February 2020

one_reviews_text: The Headset has great value and is easy to setup but the Oculus app is bad When you wake up the headset  it says Displayport and USB arent plugged in when they are unplugging them and putting them back in sometimes works and after that it dosent want to track
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 28 September 2021
review_title: It is Great... When it works

one_reviews_text: Overall the oculus rift s is a great item, I haven't had a single problem though I did learn that I still needed my glasses in vr, that was surprising for me since I am near sighted and I thought the screens were only an inch or so away, it is amazing to think that the headset actually tricks your eyes enough that I still need to wear my glasses to see what is on the screens.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 21 November 2019

one_reviews_text: Gran avance en claridad y resolución sin necesitar más máquina. Liberación de puertos USB y no necesidad de sensores
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on 21 July 2019
review_title: Gran avance en resolución, merece la pena cambiar desde cv1 a rift s

one_reviews_text: J'ai pu comparer ce casque au Quest 2.Le Rift a plusieurs avantages : plus confortable, meilleur qualité visuelle, autonomie illimitée.Cependant les câbles sont un vrai problème.De plus, le Quest est le future de la VR selon Facebook, donc le Rift S n'aura pas les exclusivités Quest.Pour ces raisons, j'ai préféré le Quest 2
review_date: Reviewed in France on 29 December 2021

one_reviews_text: Oculus hasn't worked across multiple computers and after fresh installations of Windows. Contacted their support, who have stuffed me around for 3 weeks, and now apparently closed my first request without fixing anything, and now haven't responded to my new request after 6 days.Overall, pretty garbage piece of equipment so far. Will be chasing a refund if there's no resolution soon.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 6 January 2020
review_title: Hasn't worked since I received it

one_reviews_text: Coming from CV, the increase in clarity and text readability is worth every single penny.With the beta Oculus update the tracking is flawless.The sound is awful :(Overall 4.5 stars, and the very best until the real next gen VR is on the market.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 3 August 2019

one_reviews_text: The only complaint is the LENS fog up & need to be wiped off.  Otherwise it is the best.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 8 July 2021

one_reviews_text: La qualité est bonne, mais on voit encore beaucoup les pixels, pour le prix, c'est très correct. Par contre, les plantages sont récurrents, voir intempestifs. J'ai activé le mode Béta public, je vais voir si ca va mieux, mais je dois avouer que ca m'a un peu dégouté.Ne pas jouer quand il fait trop chaud car pas d'aération pour la buée sur les lentilles...La qualité du son de l'appareil est bonne, mais tout le monde entend car ce sont des baffles au dessus des oreilles, la seule solution est de désactiver et d'utiliser un casque sans fil...Mis à part ça l’immersion est excellente. Le fait d'utiliser des caméras au lieu des balises fonctionne vraiment bien, c'est d'ailleurs ça qui m'a poussé à passer le cap de l'achat. Un expérience à essayer mais un produit pas encore assez fini.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 1 September 2019
review_title: Excellente qualité pour le prix mais beaucoup de bug

one_reviews_text: product has become faulty under warrant and Oculus are running me around in circles avaoiding the fact the need to repalce the product under warranty. terrible customer service buy another brand if you can.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 23 February 2021
review_title: terrible customer service from oculus support

one_reviews_text: The Rift S has some amazing quality lenses and a great field of view but it trades comfort  by going with a halo headband design which didn’t work with my head shape and caused discomfort
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 27 May 2020

one_reviews_text: Nice headset, and in my awkwardly sized, kind of small space the inside-out tracking makes a BIG difference. Definite recommendation over lighthouses for users who have no idea where the heck they would put lighthouses, or have furniture/walls that would block them.
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 13 February 2021
review_title: Great headset, love the inside-out tracking!

one_reviews_text: I tryed by myself few headsets in the past and in my opinion Rift S is currenty the best "budget" option on the market. First excellent tracing - work perfectly 95% of the time, 0 larger problem so far. Next is screen, that is good enough with resolution and sharpness; ergonomy is ok, headset is comfortable for me. The worst problem is lack of IPD adjustment. Overall, after 1 month of use it's a great headset and I can recommend it.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 31 January 2020
review_title: Almost perfect VR headset for price

one_reviews_text: Comprato per un'amica ed è stata pienamente soddisfatta
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 20 April 2021

one_reviews_text: Il miglior acquisto ad occhi chiusi che abbia fatto.. a distanza di 5 mesi lo uso sempre di più! Giochi competitivi e anche social!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 3 May 2021

one_reviews_text: Outside-in tracking is a huge upgrade from the CV1.  Even thought the lenses are similar and comfort is similar, the overall experience is so much better than the CV1
review_date: Reviewed in Canada on 13 August 2020

one_reviews_text: Regalato a mio figlio per Natale, ne è rimasto etusiasta oltre le aspettative!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on 27 December 2020

one_reviews_text: First foray into VR and could not be more impressed with the Rift S. Love that it only needs the headset and controllers, nothing else and seems to track my movement really well. The display seems very clear. The audio is good not great but I always use my headphones for better quality sound and it fits over the top of the rift nicely.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on 30 July 2020

one_reviews_text: Je l’ai acheté un peu sur un coup de tête et bien je ne regrette pas ! J’adore la VR.Côté pratique les capteurs sont directement incorporés sur le casque donc pas besoin d’en disposer partout dans la pièce.Point que je trouve dommage ceci dit c’est que les contrôleurs nécessitent l’utilisation de piles .. j’aurais préféré que cela soit des batteries plutôt que d’user des piles à tour de bras ..
review_date: Reviewed in France on 4 November 2021

one_reviews_text: Une image vraiment belle, une expérience immersive. L'audio est bon si l'on met le son du casque assez fort (à moitié c'est vrai que ce n'est pas excellent mais au-delà c'est plus qu'acceptable). Le seul inconvénient que j'ai trouvé c'est l'impression de porter un casque de plongée du fait que la vidéo n'est pas suffisamment étendue à la vision périphérique (d'où l'étoile en moins). Etant ma première expérience de casque VR, je ne saurais dire si les autres marques ou modèles sont meilleurs sur ce dernier point.
review_date: Reviewed in France on 10 June 2019

one_reviews_text: Super Brille mit scharfem Bild und kinderleichtem Setup des Trackings!Der Upgrade von der Vive auf die Rift S hat sich mehr als gelohnt.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on 4 June 2019
review_title: Für den Preis eine top PC-Gaming VR Brille!
